He also works at a the bus station selling tickets for a transportation company. He is requesting this loan to purchase toys because his customers are asking for them for the Christmas season. He is a very hardworking young man who is always varying his products. He is very grateful to the institution for all the support they have given him.

loans.use: Purchase toys for the holiday season

loans.name: Ana Maricela

texts.es:
Ana una joven emprendedora, deseosa de superar tiene 18 años de edad, tiene su negocio de venta de ropa, vive con sus hermanos y su madre, es soltera y no tiene hijos, reside en Puerto el Triunfo, departamento de Usulután, ella primeramente se dedicaba a la venta de meriendas y luego dispuso mejor dedicarse a la venta de ropa, viendo en este una mejor oportunidad de crecimiento, el negocio lo tiene en su casa y por días sale a visitar clientes.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ropa de nuevos estilos y colores, ya que la demanda ha aumentado y espera que siga así por la época navideña, para ella es momento oportuno realizar esta inversión y darle al negocio un mayor fortalecimiento teniendo a la mano las prendas que los clientes buscan.
Su visión es ser una comerciante mayorista, tener variedad de prendas de vestir, aumentar las ventas para mejorar la solvencia económica de la familia y pagar este préstamo de la mejor manera.
texts.en:
Ana is a young entrepreneur who very much wants to get ahead.  She’s 18 years old and has her own clothing sales business.  She lives with her siblings and her mother.  She’s single and has no children.  She lives in Puerto El Triunfo, Usulután department.

She used to sell prepared food but then decided it would be better to go into clothing sales because she thought this was a better growth opportunity.  She has the business in her home and she goes out during the day to call on her customers.

She is asking for a loan to buy new clothes in new styles and colors because demand has increased and she hopes it will continue to do so because of the Christmas season.  For her this is the opportune moment to make this investment and strengthen the business having items on hand that her customers are seeking.

Her vision is to become a wholesaler, to have a variety of items available, to increase sales to better provide economic solvency for her family and to repay this loan in the best possible way.

loans.use: To buy new clothes to sell.

loans.name: Julia Del Carmen

texts.es: Julia Del Carmen tiene, es madre soltera. Tiene 3 hijos y todos estudian. Su actividad es una pulpería,  desde hace más de 12 años pues siempre se ha preocupado por incrementar los ingresos de su hogar, no es la primera vez que solicita créditos pues ha sido muy satisfactorio. Desde muy joven le ha gustado trabajar y sacar adelante a su familia. Lo que ella solicita actualmente en este crédito es para comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, refrescos, detergentes y jugos.
texts.en: Julia del Carmen is a single mother. She has 3 children and they are all in school. She has had a grocery store business for the past 12 years. She has always paid particular attention to increasing the income generated by the store. This is not a first time loan that she requests.  Past loans have been very helpful. Since she was very young she has always enjoyed working and providing for her family. She requests a loan to purchase basic grains, snacks, breads, soft drinks, detergents and juices.

loans.use: To purchase basic grains, snacks, bread, soft drinks, detergents, and juices.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy paint, sparkles,embroidery, glue, gel, tinsel, t-shirts, cushions,  sythetic hair, styrofoam, felt, sequins, to make Father and Mother Christmas dolls and Christmas decorations

loans.name: Elizabeth  Denisse

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MI PERU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Elizabeth; ella tiene 28 años y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de muebles como mesa,,armarios,estantes,camas entre otros, la socia lo vende en las diferentes ferias que se realizan cada fin de semana y también a las personas que le solicitan.                  

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de acabo de muebles como pintura,tiner,madera entre otros. 

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank "My Peru". The bank is located in the district, area, and province of Cusco. 

Her name is Elizabeth. She is 28 years old and she is single. She carries out her daily work with her business selling furniture, such as: tables, armoires, stands, beds etc. she sells her products in the various fairs that take place on the weekends and to individuals who place orders. 

She requests a loan to purchase products for finishing furniture, such as: paint, thinner, wood etc. 

She is very grateful to all those who are becoming part of her dream and she is compromised to the payment terms of the loan.

loans.use: To purchase products for finishing furniture, such as: paint, thinner, wood etc

loans.name: Nancy Judith

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi , conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Nancy , ella tiene 56 años de edad, esta casada y fruto de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos, dos de ellos viven con ella y estudian. Su marido es chofer. Ella es licenciada en Ciencias DE La Educación y  se desempeña como maestra en una escuela de la localidad.
 
Tiene una heladería en sociedad con una de sus hijas. Además se dedica a la venta de productos Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas) trabaja los viernes, sabados y domingos en las tardes,  en su trabajo de lunes a viernes  realiza sus ventas a sus compañeras de clases, ahora desea iniciar con un nuevo segmento de ventas quiere vender semijoyas de Romanel.
 
Este crédito es justamente para comprar semijoyas de Romanel como: cadenas, pulseras, collares, etc.
Está en el Banco Comunal  12 años y le gusta por los beneficios que brinda la institución. Sus metas son seguir trabajando y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
The community bank named Maria Monserrate meets every two weeks in the district of Montecristi, a region known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for the nationally and internationally renowned artisans. It is the region from where the famous straw hats come from. 

Here we find Nancy. She is 56 years old, she is married, and she has four children. Two of her children live with her and are attending school. Her husband is a driver. She has a degree in Education Science and she works as a teacher in a local school. 

She also has an ice cream shop with one of her two daughters. She also sells Yanbal brand products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and accessories). She works on Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays in the afternoon. She sells to her colleagues from Monday to Friday. She now endeavors to start selling a new type of product; Romanel brand semi-precious jewelry.

This loan is to purchase Romanel jewelry, including: neck chains, bracelets, necklaces etc. 

She has been a member of her community bank for the past 12 years and she enjoys taking part for the benefits the organization provides. Her goal is to keep working and to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase Romanel brand beauty products.

loans.name: Guido

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “VIRGEN DEL ROSARIO DE SAN SEBASTIAN” el banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Guido; el socio tiene 43 años de edad, El socio es casado; el socio tiene 3 hijos; el socio trabaja en su propia carpintería desde hace 8 años, el es carpintero, el socio desea el préstamo para poder hacer de este un capital para poder elaborar unos muebles que tiene pendiente y para poder acabarlo desea comprar materiales, el socio es un hombre muy trabajador y con lo que ingresa a su hogar él los distribuye entre los estudios de sus menores hijos y la C., el socio ahora tiene unos muebles pendientes y le falta materiales para terminar de elaborarlos antes de entregar los trabajos y así podrá cobrar por sus trabajos. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para terminar unos muebles que el socio tiene pendientes. El socio solicita le préstamo para comprar materiales.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the community bank named "Virgen del Rosario de San Sebastian. The community bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and region of Cusco. 

His name is Guido. He is 43 years old, he is married and he has three children.  He has had his   own carpentry shop for 8 years. He is a carpenter. He wants a loan to use as capital funds to be able to make a piece of furniture that has been ordered.  In order to complete his project he needs materials. He is a very hard working man and his earnings are spent in the support of the household and in the schooling for his younger children. He has furniture that has been ordered but he is lacking materials to complete the projects. Once he is finished the furniture he will be able to collect payment. He requests a loan to invest in the purchase of materials to complete a piece of furniture that has been ordered. He requests a loan to purchase materials. 

He is very grateful and values the loan that has been granted to him. He is committed to the payment terms established for his loan.

loans.use: To purchase carpentry materials.

loans.name: Julio Eulot

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MI PERU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Julio; el tiene 42 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; el negocio que tiene el socio es un taller de estructura metálica el elabora puertas y marcos de ventanas, el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa siendo esta la manera de sacar a sus hijos adelante.  

El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para su negocio.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the community bank named "My Peru". The community bank is located in the district, province, and region of Cusco. 

His name is Julio. He is 42 years old, he is married, and he has 2 children. He has a blacksmith shop where he makes doors and window frames. He works together with his wife so that they together can provide for their children.

He requests a loan to purchase materials for his business. 

He is very grateful to all those who have become part of his dream and he is committed to the payment terms established for his loan.

loans.use: To purchase materials for his blacksmith business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy materials to make advertising

loans.name: Jhovana Karen

texts.es: La señora Jhovana vive con su mama quien de muy pequeña le enseño a trabajar y sobresalir, Jhovana se dedica a la venta de carne de res y pollo quien vende cerca de su domicilio tiene bastante demanda porque es la única que vende en esa zona, ella solicito el crédito para comprar una refrigerador ya que la que tiene es de su mama y no tiene espacio para poner la carne y con la calor se descompone muy rápido, con su heladera podrá realizar un buen trabajo y poder vender la carne siempre en buen estado.
texts.en: Jhovana lives with her mother, whom since she was very young, taught her to work and to excel in her work.  Jhovana sells beef and chicken near her home.  She has quite a lot of demand for her beef and chicken because she is the only one who is selling in this region.  She is requesting the loan to buy a refrigerator since the one she has is her mother's, and there is no space to put the meat, and with the heat, it decomposes very quickly.  With her refrigerator she will be able to do a good job and be able to sell the meat always in a good state.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator and for working capital

loans.name: Ruth Velia

texts.es: Ruth Velia de 49 años, tiene su negocio que es una pulpería. Su vivienda es muy humilde a pesar de esto es aquí donde llegan sus clientes a solicitar sus diferentes productos. Hace 10 años comenzó a trabajar con algunos ahorros compro golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes y granos básicos. En la actualidad tiene su negocio muy bien establecido para mejorar los ingresos de su hogar. Trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Con el préstamo quiere comprar la materia prima necesaria. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa ya que le faltan algunas mejoras.
texts.en: Ruth Velia is 49 years old and she has a convenience store. Her home is very humble but nevertheless her clients come to her store to purchase various different products. She started out 10 years ago. With a few savings she managed to purchase snacks, soft drinks, bread, detergents and basic grains.  She works from 8 in the morning until 10 at night. With this loan she wishes to purchase merchandise. In the future she wants to finish building her home.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Karen Gissela

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate  se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Karen, ella tiene 24 años de edad, esta soltera, vive en la casa de sus padres, estudio en la Universidad de Manta en donde obtuvo el título de Ing. En Comercio Exterior. Para ella este es su tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda y el compañerismo que hay en el grupo.

Ella desarrolla muchas funciones en su vida diaria tiene una heladería, además de eso trabaja en Ciudad Alfaro, pero este trabajo no le impide que ella se dedique a lo que ella le gusta que es la atención de su negocio, dice que ya tiene su heladería por tres años y que esta le sirvió mucho para sus estudios, con los créditos que ha recibido ha logrado ampliarla y adecuarla cada día mas, en ella trabaja en las tardes y noches, los sábados y domingos trabaja todo el día. Sus productos los compra en Manta y Portoviejo directo de los distribuidores.

Este crédito es para comprar helados, dos mesas y seis sillas para mejorar la atención a sus clientes. Sus sueños son comprar un carro y poder viajar para conocer  muchos lugares.
texts.en:
The community bank named Maria Monserrate meets every two weeks in the district of Montecristi.  The region is known for its rich pre-colonial history and for its nationally and internationally renowned artisans. This region is where the famous straw hats come from. 

Here we meet Karen. She is 24 years old, she is single, and she lives with her parents. She went to Manta University where she achieved a degree in International Commerce. This is the third loan cycle in which she has participated together with her community bank. She enjoys partaking for the support and collegiality within the group.

She takes on various jobs in her daily life. She has an ice cream shop, and she also works in the city of Alfaro. But this work doesn't stop her from what she enjoys most: her business. She has had her ice cream shop for three years and it helped her get through her studies. With the loans that she has received she has managed to expand and furnish her business more each day. She works in the afternoons and in the evenings. On Saturdays and Sundays she works all day. She purchases her products in Manta and in Portoviejo directly from the distributors.

This loan will be used to purchase ice cream, two tables and six chairs to improve her service to the clients. Her dream is to purchase a car to be able to travel and see many new places.

loans.use: To purchase ice cream, tables and chairs.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MI PERU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Fernando; el tiene 49 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de librería el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa siendo su horario desde las 09:00am hasta las 08:00pm todos los días. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para implementar su negocio como cuadernos lapiceros,plumones,papel entre otros.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank "My Peru". The bank is located in the district, province, and region of Cusco.

His name is Fernando. He is 49 years old, he is married, and he has 2 children. He balances his every day chores with his office supply store business. He works together with is wife from 9 am to 8 pm every day. 

He requires a loan to supply his business with notebooks, pencils, pens, paper etc.

He is grateful to all those who have contributed to his dream and he is committed to the payment terms established for his loan.

loans.use: To purchase office supplies.

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “VIRGEN DEL ROSARIO DE SAN SEBASTIAN” el banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ramiro; el socio tiene 42 años de edad, El socio es conviviente; el socio tiene 3 hijos; el socio en la municipalidad de Anta como chofer el socio tenía un pequeño negocio de confección de calzados, el socio ahora tiene junto a su conyugue una tienda de abarrotes, el socio desea el préstamo para poder invertir en la tienda de abarrotes y comprar mercadería nueva y de este modo implementar mas su negocio, el socio desea comprar al por mayor fideos, arroz, leche, azúcar y otros productos de primera necesidad, el socio tiene este negocio desde hace dos años. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería para implementar el negocio.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank "Virgen del Rosario de San Sebastian", located in the district of Huanchac in the province and region of Cusco. 

His name is Ramiro. He is 42 years old and he lives together with his partner. He has three children. He is a driver in the municipality of Anta but he also has a shoe store. He also has a convenience store together with his wife. He wants a loan to invest in his convenience store, to purchase more inventory and with it supply his store. He wants to purchase in wholesale the following items: pasta, rice, milk, sugar and other basic products. He has had this business for the past 2 years. He requests a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise with which to supply his business. 

He is grateful and he values the loan granted to him. He is committed to the payment terms established for his loan.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Raef

texts.en: Raef is a 53 year-old, married man with two children.  Raef owns a van that he uses to transports fruit and vegetables.  Since 1997, this business has been his only source of income. Raef is well-known among businessmen in the wholesale market and they recommend him to other retail clients.  Raef is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua for the second time.  The loan will be used to improve his business through starting wholesale vegetables and fruits trade, in addition to finishing construction on his house before the Holy and winter seasons.  Raef’s first loan had a positive impact on his business and he hopes this one will have an even better impact.

loans.use: To improve his business through wholesale trade, in addition to finishing his house construction before the Holy and the winter season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his car and wool for weaving.

loans.name: Gualeska Isayana

texts.es: La señora Gualeska Isayana tiene 26 años y es madre de dos hijos. Se dedica al comercio de cosméticos, como perfumes, cremas, lápiz labial, pintura de uñas, accesorios entre otros todos los días sale a recorrer las calles con sus productos y aprovecha para venderle a una gran cantidad de clientes. Siempre le ha gustado conversar con sus clientes y así que le realicen sus diferentes pedidos. La misma necesidad de contar con sus propios recursos para los estudios y gastos  de su pequeño hijo. Este crédito es para pagar el pedido que tiene y además para comprar otros productos que solicito. Sus metas son que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y prosperar con su negocio.
texts.en: Gualeska Isayana is 26 years old and she is the mother of two children. Her business is the sale of beauty products such as perfumes, skin creams, lipsticks, nail polish, and accessories. Every day she takes to the streets with her products, selling many products to her clients. She has always enjoyed chatting with her clients while they place their orders.  She saw a need to start her business in order to cover her young son's expenses and school fees. This loan will be used to fill an order that has been placed and to purchase other products that have been requested.  Her goal is to see her kids finish school and find success with her business.

loans.use: To purchase beauty products.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MI PERU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Victoria; ella tiene 40 años y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropas, la socia viaja hasta Bolivia para comprar su mercadería para luego ofrecerlo a sus amistades, y personas que le solicitan, también compra cuadros para las salas de las casas de esta forma la socia saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar más mercadería para su negocio.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank named "My Peru". The bank is located in the district, province and region of Cusco. 

Her name is Victoria. She is 40 years old and she is a single mother of 1 boy. Her business is the buying and selling of clothing. She travels all the way to Bolivia to purchase her merchandise to resale to her friends and all those who have placed orders. She also purchases framed pictures for the living room. She is able to provide for her family through these businesses. 

She requests a loan to purchase more merchandise for her business. 

She is grateful to all of those who have become part of her dream and she is committed to the payment terms established for her loan.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Luis Alberto; el tiene 24 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de servicio de taxi que hace servicio en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco, el trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, el socio quiere mejorar el carro. El  socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member is belongs to the community bank named "The Dawn". The bank is located in the district, province, and region of Cusco. 

His name is Luis Alberto. He is 24 years old and he is single. He has a taxi business, providing service along various streets in the city of Cusco. He works from 5 a.m. to 8 p.m.  He needs to carry out some maintenance to his car and he requests a loan to this end. 

He is very grateful to all of those who have become part of his dream and he is committed to the payment terms established for his loan.

loans.use: To carry out maintenance repairs to his car.

loans.name: Ana Yolanda

texts.es:
Ana Yolanda, reside en Gualococti, departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan dulce, tiene 28 años de edad, vive con sus padres, sus hijos Anderson de 7 años y Johana de 2 años, y una hermana, tiene 8 años de manejar el negocio y el pan lo realiza cuatro veces por semana, este oficio lo aprendió de su madre.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima como harina, manteca, jalea, azúcar y latas para moldear el pan, este préstamo le ayudara a disponer de materiales para la elaboración del pan y dar salida a la demanda de los clientes.
Su principal propósito es cancelar bien el préstamo y poder sacar adelante a su familia ya que su sueño es que a través del negocio  construir su casa.
texts.en:
Ana Yolanda lives in Gualococti, in the department of Morazán. She makes and sells pan dulce (a traditional El Salvadoran bread). She is 28 years old, and lives with her parents, her children, Anderson who is 7 years old, and Johana who is 2, and a sister. She has been in the business for eight years and she makes the bread four times per week. She learned this trade from her mother.

She is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as flour, butter, jelly, sugar, and tins to mold the bread. This loan will help her get materials for the making of bread and to meet the demand of her customers. Her primary goal is to pay off the loan well and to be able to get her family ahead since her dream is to build her house through success in this business.

loans.use: To buy flour, butter, jelly, sugar and tins to mold the bread.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “VIRGEN DEL ROSARIO DE SAN SEBASTIAN” el banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Roberto; el socio tiene 45 años de edad, El socio es conviviente; el socio tiene 3 hijos; el socio tiene una tienda de venta de repuestos de autos, el socio junto a su conyugue trabajan atendiendo la tienda de venta de repuestos, ellos también viajan cada cierto tiempo para comprar mercadería que consiste en frenos, timones, fundas y otros para diferentes modelos y tipos de autos, el socio desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería, el socio desea el dinero para comprar repuestos para autos. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos de autos.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank named "Virgen del Rosario de San Sebastian". The bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and region of Cusco. 

His name is Roberto. He is 45 years old; he lives with his partner and their three children. He has a spare parts store for automobiles. He and his wife run the business together selling spare parts. They also travel every so often to purchase merchandise such as breaks and seat covers for various models and types of cars. He requests a loan to invest in the purchase of spare parts. 

He is grateful for the loan and he values the opportunity. He is committed to the payment terms established for his loan.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for resale.

loans.name: Elsa Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MI PERU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Elsa; ella tiene 69 años y es viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, ella vende en un pequeño stand en el distrito de san sebastian,la socia trabaja conjuntamente con su familia, siendo esto el medio para salir adelante. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar equipos de celulares para el negocio de su hija y a la vez para comprar algunos insumos para su negocio.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank called "My Peru". The bank is located in the district, province and region of Cusco. 

Her name is Elsa.  She is 69 years old, she is a widow, and she has 3 children. She sells prepared foods for a living. She has a small food stand in the district of San Sebastian. She works together with her family, this being her only way to provide for herself. 

She requests a loan to purchase cell phones for her daughter’s business and to stock her own business with ingredients. 

She is grateful to all those who have become part of her dream. She is committed to the payment terms of her loan.

loans.use: To purchase cell phones for her daughter's business and ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: María Cristina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

La señora María es socia del Banco Comunal desde sus inicios y esta muy contenta en el ya que gracias a los créditos recibidos de parte de la Fundación Espoir ha logrado sacar su negocio adelante. Tiene 53 años de edad, esta casada y fruto de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos todos mayores pero dos de ellos aun viven con ella. Su marido es comerciante.

Ella se dedica al comercio, tiene un local donde  vende juguetes, bisutería y reliquias las mismas que son muy apreciadas por los visitantes que a diario se hacen presentes en el cantón por ser un lugar muy tradicional, trabaja todos los días desde las 10am hasta las 16h00, algunos de sus productos los compra en Guayaquil y otros a artesanos de la localidad.

Este crédito es para comprar más mercadería como: juguetes, bisutería y reliquias para surtir aun mas su negocio. Su sueño es tener un gran local.
texts.en:
The community bank named Maria Monserrate meets every two weeks in the district of Montecristi, a region known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its nationally and internationally renowned artisans. This is the region from where the famous straw hats originate.

Maria has been a member of this community bank since its inception and she is very happy to take part especially for the loans she has received. Fundacion Espoir (Kiva Field Partner) has given her the ability to find success with her business. She is 53 years old, she is married, and they have four grown children, although two are still living with her. Her husband is a merchant. 

She is a merchant who sells toys, jewelry and other objects. Her merchandise is sought out by visitors who come to the district every day. The region is a very traditional place. She works there every day from 10 a.m. to 4p.m. She purchases some of her merchandise from Guayaquil and from other artisans in the region. 

Her loan will be used to purchase merchandise such as toys, jewelry and souvenirs to resupply her business. Her dream is to have a large store.

loans.use: To purchase toys, jewerly and souvenirs.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es: El Señor Isidro tiene 41 años, está casado y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Además de ser una buen padre responsable el se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos, tiene su local en su vivienda en donde es visitado por una gran variedad de clientes. Trabaja todos los días desde las 8 hasta las 9 de la noche pues tiene que andar un diferentes comarcas para buscar al mejor cerdo Este crédito es para comprar cerdos ya que se acerca la temporada navideña y tiene una gran variedad de clientes. Su meta es proporcionar una gran variedad de cerdos.
texts.en: Isidro is 41 years old, he is married and he has 3 young children who are still in his care. Aside from being a good and responsible father, he is also buys and sells livestock. He has a store in his house where a great variety of people come to buy. He works every day form 8 to 9 at night.  He goes out to various stables to find the best heads of livestock. This loan will be used to purchase pigs to get ready for the Christmas season when his clients increase. His goal is to be able to supply a variety of livestock.

loans.use: To use as working capital.

loans.name: Rosendo

texts.es: El Sr. Rosendo tiene 31 años de edad, casado con la señora Carla, tienen 2 hijos , Don Rosendo es un hombre que trabajo desde sus 20 años de edad en una propiedad cuidando  animales (vaca caballo ovejas gallinas y/u otros ) luego años después se dedico a la elaboración de queso, ahora actualmente don Rosendo se encarga de distribuir quesos a los supermercados de Santa Cruz  de la sierra. El crédito que se le otorgo al cliente es para terminar de construir un cuarto compra de (cerámicas cemento pinturas). El cliente  manifestó su agradecimiento por la rapidez del crédito y lo bien que lo atendieron en la Institución.
texts.en: Rosendo is 31 years old and married to Carla.  They have two children.  Rosendo is a man who has been working since he was 20 years old in a property taking care of animals (cows, horses, sheep, chickens and/or others).  Then years later, he began making cheese.  Now Rosendo is in charge of distributing cheese to the supermarkets of Santa Cruz de la Sierra.  The loan granted to Rosendo is to finish the construction of a room and to buy pottery, cement, and paintings.  Rosendo expresses his gratitude for the speed of the loan, and how well the Institution serves him.

loans.use: To buy pottery, cement, and paintings

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Rent payment for a new home

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Beatriz; ella tiene 35 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de aretes, ella trae de la ciudad de Bolivia y lo vende en la ciudad de Cusco en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere tener una tienda para vender los aretes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar aretes al por mayor.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank named "The Dawn". The bank is located in the district, province, and region of Cusco. 

Her name is Beatriz. She is 35 years old; she lives together with her partner and their son. Her business is selling earrings. She brings her merchandise from Bolivia for resale in along the streets of Cusco.  She dreams of having a store from where to sell her earrings. She requests a loan to purchase earrings in wholesale. 

She is grateful to all those who have become part of her dream. She is committed to the payment terms established for her loan.

loans.use: To purchase earrings in wholesale.

loans.name: Yusi

texts.es: Yusi tiene 31 años, vive en compañía de su esposo y sus hijos en su casa propia. Toda su vida ha estado vinculada a las tareas agrícolas y ganaderas, como herencia que sus padres le dejaron, enseñándole todo lo que es necesario en la vida del campo. En la actualidad trabaja cultivando papa y maíz, su esposo se encarga de las duras tareas que implica el removido del terreno para sembrar y manipular el arado entre otros y por su parte Yusi con sus hijos se encargan de esparcir las semillas y recoger las cosechas según sea el caso. Aunque hay ocasiones en las cuales contratan mano de obra para que le ayuden a realizar este trabajo en menos tiempo,  también tiene sumo cuidado con los animales que tienen sobre todo los toros y  vacas de su establo, en donde lo alimenta con pastizales que ellas misma cultiva. En  adelante desea tener más cantidad de animales y mejorar en sus posteriores cosechas. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero y agradece  a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono para la siembra que va realizar, así como la compra de un toro que le servirá para engordarlo y venderlo en los próximos meses.
texts.en: Yusi is 31 years old. She lives together with her husband and their children in a house that is their own. All of her live she has been a farmer. Her parents taught her all that she needed to know about life in the country, and this was their inheritance to her. Today she has corn and potato harvest and her husband takes care of the difficult task of plowing the fields to prepare them for seeding, or he takes care of the harvest, whatever the case.  Sometimes they hire help to carry out these jobs in less time.  They also have livestock to take care of, especially bulls and cows they keep in a stable. They are fed natural foods from the harvest. In the future she hopes to have more livestock and improve her future harvest. This is her first loan through MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She is very happy to have the financial support and she is grateful to all those who contribute to the loan that she requests. It will be very useful for the progress of her business. The loan that she requests will be invested in the purchase of fertilizers for her plantations. She will also purchase a bull that will be fattened and sold in the six months.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and a bull.

loans.name: Juan Doroteo

texts.es: Juan Doroteo tiene 66 años, está casado y vive con su esposa y 3 hijos. El se dedica a brindar el servicio de acarreo. Tiene 15 años que se ha dedicado a eso y no quiere que su negocio termine, a pesar de los problemas que ha enfrentado como es la enfermedad de uno de sus hijos ya que es asmático, es por eso que se preocupa todos los días por generar ingresos para su negocio. Es el primer préstamo que solicita, El no había tenido antes problemas con su negocio, pero si quiere seguir creciendo en su negocio. El quiere invertir en su negocio para ofrecer un buen servicio.
texts.en:
Juan Doroteo, 66, is married and lives with his wife and three children.  He provides cartage services.  He has been in this line of work for 15 years and would like his business to continue. 

Despite problems faced, like one of his children’s illness (he’s asthmatic), he strives daily to earn income for his business.

This is the first loan he has requested.  He hadn’t had any problems with his business previously but he wants to continue growing in his business.  He wants to invest in his business in order to offer better service.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Judith Genoveva

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Judith Genoveva; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es divorciada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de realizar eventos como matrimonios, bautizos y quince años, la socia organiza diferentes eventos y ahora tiene un pollería, la socia trabaja en forma independiente, es una mujer que siempre está trabajando para sacar adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere mejorar la pollería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar un horno para la pollería.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
udith Genoveva is a member of the “El Amanecer” (The Dawn) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Judith is 36 years old.  She is divorced and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business organizing events such as weddings, baptisms and 15th birthday celebrations.  She organizes different events and now also has a poultry store.  She is self-employed and is always working to get her child ahead in life.  She would like to improve her poultry store.  She is requesting a loan to buy an oven for the store.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy an oven for her poultry store

loans.name: Francisca Margarita

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Francisca, ella tiene 43 años de edad, esta casada y fruto de esta relación tiene un hijo de 15 años que  estudia en el colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.

Se dedica a la venta de gafas y sombreros de paja toquilla que son muy apreciados sobre todo por los turistas que visitan el lugar, su forma de venta es recorriendo las calles, trabaja los viernes, sabados y domingos, sus productos se los envían desde Guayaquil y también compra a artesanos del lugar. Dice que lleva varios años en este negocio y que hay días buenos y malos pero que esto por lo menos le ayuda para los gastos de su familia.
 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar gafas y sombreros. Está en el Banco Comunal hace  8 años y le gusta por los beneficios que la institución ofrece como por ejemplo los créditos emergentes, de estudio y otros. Sus sueños son ver que su hijo termine sus estudios y sea un profesional.
texts.en:
Every fortnight the 'María Monserrate' community bank meets in Montecristi canton which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts which are well known both nationally and internationally.  It is the home of the famous Panama hat.

Here we find Francisca who is 43 years old.  She is married and has a 15 year-old son from her marriage who is in school.  Her husband is a salesman.

Francisca sells sunglasses and Panama hats which are very popular, especially with the tourists who visit her town.  She sells in the streets, working Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays.  Her products are sent from Guayaquil and she also buys from local craftsmen.  She says that she has been in this business for several years and that there are both good days and bad days.  However, it is helping her to cover her family's expenses.

This loan will be used to buy glasses and hats.  Francisca has been a member of her community bank for 8 years and she likes the benefits that the institution offers such as, for example, the emergency loans, the student loans, and others.  Her dream is to see her son finish his studies and become a professional.

loans.use: To buy glasses and hats

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jose Alberto; el tiene 56 años de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de pensión familiar, el socio da a algunos estudiantes la pensión familiar como dándoles desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, el socio quiere mejorar el negocio. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar y también para pagar algunas deudas.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Jose Alberto belongs to the “El Amanecer” (The Dawn) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Jose Alberto is 56 years old.  He is married and has 4 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business which is a family guest house.  He provides some students with accommodation, breakfasts, lunches and dinners.  He would like to improve his business.  He is requesting this loan to buy products such as cooking supplies and also to pay off some debts.

He is grateful to those who will take part in his dream by funding his loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy cooking supplies and also pay off some debts

loans.name: Ericka Delfina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ericka Delfina; ella tiene 26 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de panadería y también tiene un locutorio donde realiza llamadas a cualquier lugar del país y la panadería atiende desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de panadería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar harina, manteca e ingredientes para preparar el pan.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Ericka Delfina belongs to the “El Amanecer” (The Dawn) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Ericka is 26 years old and lives with her partner.  She has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her bakery business.  She also has an establishment which contains telephone booths for public use from which customers can make calls to any part of the country.  She serves in her bakery from 6.00am to 6.00pm.  She would like to improve her bakery business.  She is requesting this loan to buy flour, butter and ingredients for baking bread.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy flour, butter and ingredients for baking bread

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Maria Teresa tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, el negocio que se dedica es una panadería. Desde hace 10 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy beneficioso. Maria tiene una buena experiencia por trabajar con financiamientos y ha sido muy satisfactorio. Tiene que levantarse todos los días temprano su labor es desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche ya que sus diferentes clientes siempre llegan a comprar sus diferentes productos. El crédito será invertido en la compra de huevo, queso, leña,  leche, mantequilla entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Maria Teresa has two young children and she is responsible for them. She has had a bakery for 10 years which has benefitted her. She gets up very early each morning and works from 8:00am to 10:00pm because her costumers go to buy her products throughout the day.

Maria has had satisfactory experience working with credit. The loan will be used to buy eggs, cheese, milk, butter and fire-wood among other ingredients and supplies.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MI PERU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Norma; ella tiene 59 años y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes siendo esta la unica actividad que realiza por el momento,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,leche entre otros mas ,la socia trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo y de esta forma sacan a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar mas su tienda de abarrotes. 

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Communal Bank “Mi Peru” [My Peru]. The bank is in the District of Cusco, Province of Cusco in the Department of Cusco.

Mrs. Norma is 59 years old, married, and has five children. She divides her time between house chores and working at the grocery store, which is the only work she does at this time. She sells staple food like rice, sugar, and milk, among others. She and her husband work at the store and it provides for their family’s needs.

The member is requesting the loan to buy more products for the store. She is grateful to the different lenders who make these loans possible and she has committed herself to pay in a timely manner.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to buy groceries for her store.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gabriela; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es casada; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa, ella vende en forma independiente y lo distribuye a diferentes tiendas de ropa, ella quiere tener una tienda donde pueda vender la ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como pantalones, blusas y chompas.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Communal Bank “El Amanecer” [The Sunrise]. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, Province of Cusco in the Department of Cusco. 

The member is Mrs. Gabriela.  She is 29 years old and married. She divides her time between house chores and buying and selling clothing. She sells to individuals and distributes to other stores. She would like to have her own store to sell the clothing.

Mrs. Gabriela is requesting the loan to buy pants, blouses and jackets. She is grateful to the lenders who contribute to make her dreams come true and is committed to paying in a timely manner.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to buy clothes like pants, blouses and jackets.

loans.name: Mireya Yankarla

texts.es: La señora Mireya dedicada al servicio de transcripción en su domicilio realiza este servicio para todos los estudiantes que frecuentan por la zona ya que existe una universidad muy cerca de su domicilio, las personas que requieren este servicio ya la conocen a la señora por eficiencia y rapidez para transcribir y realizar trabajos de investigación, Con este trabajo ayuda a su esposo para poder sostener a la familia con alimentación su familia que es numerosa y requieren muchas necesidades, una de estas es una lavandería en su casa motivo por el cual solicita el crédito para la construcción de la lavandería, la Sra. Mireya esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mireya provides transcription services from her home.  She provides this service to all the students who are in her area since there is a university very near to her home.  The people who require this service already know Mireya for her efficiency and speed in transcribing and carrying out research work.  Through her work, Mireya helps her husband to support and feed their large family who have a lot of needs, one of which is a laundry in their home.  Mireya is requesting this loan so that she can build a laundry.  She is very grateful to the institution for the support which they have provided.

loans.use: To build a laundry in her home

loans.name: Juan Oswaldo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MI PERU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan; el tiene 41 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de industrialización de frutas como mermeladas,yogurt,compotas de diferentes frutas, el socio lleva ya unos años en este negocio en el cual trabaja con su pareja siendo esta la forma de sacar a sus hijos adelante.  

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio. 

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the loan group "MI PERU" ("My Peru"), located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Juan, 41, lives with his partner and has one child. Alongside his daily tasks he runs a fruit processing business to produce jams, yogurt and various fruit compotes. He has been running it for a few years and he works alongside his partner. They do it to support their family. 

He is requesting the loan to purchase supplies for his business. He would like to thank those contributing to his dream through this and is committed to repaying it in the agreed terms.

loans.use: Loan requested to purchase supplies for his business.

loans.name: Donato

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Donato; el tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de carpintería, el realiza diferentes tipos de muebles como sillas, mesas y ventanas, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar madera y materiales como pegamentos para realizar los muebles.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the "EL AMANECER" ("The Dawn") loan group, located in the district of Cusco in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Donato, 33, lives with his partner and has 2 children. Alongside his daily tasks he runs a carpentry business. He makes different kinds of furniture, such as chairs, tables and windows. He works from 6am to 7pm and thanks to the business he can support his children. He would like to expand his business.

He is requesting a loan to buy wood and materials such as glue to make furniture. He would like to thank those helping him achieve his dream, and is committed to repaying the loan in the terms agreed.

loans.use: The partner is requesting a loan to buy wood and materials, such as glue, to make furniture.

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gabriela; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es casada; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa, ella vende en forma independiente y lo distribuye a diferentes tiendas de ropa, ella quiere tener una tienda donde pueda vender la ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como pantalones, blusas y chompas.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member is part of the "EL AMANECER" ("The Dawn") loan group, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Gabriela is 29 years old and married. Alongside her daily activities she buys and sells clothing. She sells independently and sells to different clothing stores. She would like to own a shop where to sell clothes. She is requesting a loan to buy clothing such as trousers, blouses and sweaters.

She would like to thank those supporting her dream and is committed to repaying the loan in the agreed terms.

loans.use: The partner requests the loan to buy clothing such as trousers, blouses and sweaters.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: La señora Maria, tiene 29 años. La señora Maria tiene su negocio de compra y venta de ropa nueva. Este negocio empezó hace 6 años con muy poco capital de trabajo, como una búsqueda de fuente de ingresos alternativos. Es una joven que tiene todas las ganas de salir adelante con su medio de vida. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita crédito. Actualmente con este financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de faldas, pantalones, trajes, vestidos ya que se acerca una buena temporada.
texts.en: Mrs. Maria is 29 years old. Mrs. Maria has a business which buys and sells new clothes. This business started 6 years ago with very little working capital as a search for a source of alternative income. She is a young woman with a lot of desire to get ahead in her line of work. This is not the first time she has asked for a loan. The financing she is currently asking for is to buy skirts, pants, suits, and dresses as the good season is approaching.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Gina Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MI PERU”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Gina; ella tiene 27 años y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio tienda de abarrotes donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,leche,huevos y golosinas como galletas ,dulces entre otros mas,la socia es una persona muy emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante siendo este su medio de salir adelante por su hijo. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar mas su tienda de abarrotes. 

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Gina belongs to the “MI PERU” (My Peru) community bank which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of the same name.

Gina is 27 years old.  She is single and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery store where she sells basic products such as rice, sugar, milk, eggs, candies and cookies.  She is a very enterprising person and has a great desire to get herself and her son ahead in life.

She is requesting this loan to improve her grocery store.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To improve her grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Edda Patricia; ella tiene 46 años de edad y es divorciada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de repostería, ella hace mermeladas de todos los sabores como naranja, fresa, manzana y duraznos, la socia también prepara tortas y pasteles, la socia quiere tener una tienda donde pueda vender la mermelada y tortas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ingredientes para preparar las mermeladas y tortas.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Edda Patricia belongs to the “El Amanecer” (The Dawn) community bank which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of the same name.

She is 46 years old, divorced, and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her confectionery business.  She makes jam in all flavors such as orange, strawberry, apple and peach.  She also makes cakes.  She would like to have a store where she can sell her jams and cakes.  She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients for making jam and cakes.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by helping to fund her loan and she pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for making jams and cakes

loans.name: Yelitza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yelitza; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, ella tiene una combi que hace servicio público, la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 7.00 p.m, por medio de este negocio ella está ahorrando para poder estudiar, la socia quiere mejorar el servicio de combi. La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Yelitza is a member of the “El Amanecer” (The Dawn) community bank which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of the same name.

Yelitza is 23 years old and single.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her transport business.  She has a minibus which she uses to provide a public transport service.  She works from 5.00am to 7.00pm.  Through her business, she is saving up so that she can study.  She would like to improve her minibus service and is requesting this loan so that she can have maintenance work done on her vehicle.

She would like to thank those who will take part in her dream by helping to fund her loan and she pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To have maintenance work done on her vehicle

loans.name: Elma

texts.es: Elma, de 60 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de sus 3 hijos mayores, que trabajan; y  juntos se esfuerzan cada día para salir adelante. Esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a la venta de bebidas, según la temporada; es decir durante el verano comercializa chicha morada (bebida hecha en base a maíz morado), y jugos de frutas; y en temporada de invierno vende café. Dice que  le gusta mucho su labor pues la realiza en una mesa que esta instalada afuera de su vivienda, de manera ambulatoria,  y desde ahí no descuida las labores de su hogar. Lo que no le gusta es que no puede vender hasta muy tarde pues aún no tiene licencia de funcionamiento del negocio. Sin embargo, tiene muchos planes para mejorar el negocio de venta de bebidas; y quiere habilitar un pequeño ambiente de su casa para vender en ese lugar de manera más estable. Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Elma tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de artículos descartables (vasos de diferentes variedades), además de ingredientes para sus bebidas como maíz, frutas, azúcar y café que necesita para seguir trabajando sin problemas.
texts.en:
Elma is 60 years old.  She lives in her own home with her 3 grown-up children who work.  They all work hard every day to get ahead in life.

This enterprising woman sells drinks according to the season.  That is to say, in summer she sells 'chicha morada' (a drink made from purple corn) and fruit juices.  In the winter, she sells coffee.  She says that she likes her work a lot because she sells her drinks from a table just outside her home, as a street trader, which means that she doesn't have to neglect her housework.  What she doesn't like is that she can't sell until very late in the day because she still doesn't have an operating licence for her business.  However, she has many plans to improve her business.  She would like to adapt an area of her home so that she can sell her products there in a more stable manner.

This is Elma's second loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments punctually because she doesn't want to make a bad impression on the people who have made the loan possible as it will allow her to continue working in search of progress.

Elma plans to invest her loan in buying disposable products (different types of cups) as well as ingredients for her drinks such as corn, fruit, sugar and coffee which she needs if she is to continue working without any problems.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as sugar, corn and coffee.  To buy disposable cups.

loans.name: Imelda Del Socorro

texts.es: Imelda Del Socorro tiene 55 años y es madre de tres hijos que en la actualidad ya son mayores de edad. Para la señora Imelda este es su decimo crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le ha brindado para sacar su negocio adelante. Su negocio es la venta de comida, que son platillos como gallo pinto, queso frito, maduro, tajadas, enchiladas, pollo frito y asado. La mayoría de sus clientes siempre regresan a su local, porque la comida de Imelda es muy buena  Trabaja todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche sigue con esta labor. Este crédito es para comprar gaseosas, granos básicos, verduras, leña, bolsas platos entre otras cosas. Su sueño es tener un local mucho más grande para brindar más comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Imelda Del Socorro is 55 years old.  She has three grown-up children.  This is Imelda's tenth loan and she appreciates the help that she has been given to get ahead in her business.  Her business is selling meals.  Imelda makes dishes such as 'gallo pinto' (a national dish made of beans, rice and spices), 'queso frito' (fried cheese), 'maduro' (plantain), 'tajadas' (fried plantains), enchiladas, fried chicken and roast chicken.

Most of Imelda's customers keep coming back to her premises because her food is very good.  She works every day from 6.00am to 10.00pm.  This loan will be used to buy soda, basic grains, vegetables, firewood, bags, plates, etc.  Her dream is to have much bigger premises so that she can make her customers more comfortable.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.es: Antonieta, de 53 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de sus dos hijos, mayores, de los cinco que tiene, y  juntos habitan un populoso barrio al norte de la ciudad. Esta emprendedora dama se dedica a la comercialización de productos de belleza, de una reconocida marca, y también vende  productos energizantes, los cuales ofrece a través de un catálogo, donde sus clientes realizan sus pedidos y ella les trae, luego de unos días regresa para que le paguen. Esta muy satisfecha con el negocio que tiene, porque le ha permitido sacar adelante a sus hijos, además cuando vende en cantidad la empresa para la que trabaja, le obsequia buenos incentivos como electrodomésticos. La mayor parte del día se encuentra caminando en las calles en la búsqueda de nuevos clientes, y el negocio le genera ganancias, por lo que esta ahorrando para en el futuro lograr  instalar un negocio en el mercado de su zona. Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Antonieta tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de cantidad de productos de belleza y energizantes, pues quiere tenerlos en stock y ofrecerles variedad a sus clientes, de esta manera espera continuar adelante.
texts.en:
Antonieta is 53 years old.  She lives in her own home with her two grown-up sons.  She has five children altogether.  They live in a densely-populated neighborhood in the north of the city.  This enterprising lady sells beauty products from a well-known company.  She also sells energy products which she offers through a catalog.  Her customers make their orders and she delivers them.  She then returns a few days later to collect payment.  Antonieta is very satisfied with her business because it has enabled her to get her children ahead in life.  Also, when she sells a lot of products, the company she works for presents her with good incentives such as household appliances.  Most of the day she walks the streets looking for new customers.  Her business is profitable and it is enabling her to save up so that in the future she can set up a business in a local market.

This is Antonieta's third loan with MFP and she pledges to pay her loan installments on time because she doesn't want to make a bad impression on the people who are making this loan possible as it will enable her to continue working in search of progress.  Antonieta plans to invest her loan in buying a large quantity of beauty products and energy products as she would like to have them in stock so that she has a variety of products to offer to her customers.  In this way she hopes to continue making progress.

loans.use: To stock up on beauty products and energy products

loans.name: Melania De Jesus

texts.es: La señora Melania se desempeña como es en la venta de ropa tiene 37 años de edad, Ante la necesidad de obtener ingresos para solventar en parte los gastos de su familia se dedica a la venta de ropa trabaja todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche algunas veces deja al crédito y cobra todos los fines de semana. Este crédito es para comprar más de sus productos ya que tiene pedidos, va a comprar productos de oferta. Sus sueños son de ampliar su actividad ya que su negocio ha dado resultado.
texts.en:
Melania is 37 years old and sells clothes in order to make money to help cover her family's expenses.  She works every day from 8 in the morning until 9 at night.  Sometimes she leaves her items on credit and collects payment on the weekends.

This loan will be used to buy more items since she has orders pending.  She will buy items which are on offer.  Her dream is to expand her business since it has worked out.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Deysi

texts.es: Deysi, de 38 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de su esposo Víctor de 40 años y de su pequeña hija. Esta emprendedora mujer se dedica desde hace 1 año a la preparación y venta de menús (comida ofrecida en taper). Desde muy temprano se despierta para cocinar los 50 platillos que debe ofrecer a sus clientes,  durante 6 días a la semana, luego al mediodía, y con la ayuda de su hermana se dirige al mercado de su zona, donde debe dejar todos los menús a sus comensales, quienes la esperan ansiosos por su deliciosa sazón. Lo que no le gusta de la labor es que cobra semanalmente, en una fecha indicada, pero esto a la vez le permite ganar un buen dinero seguro. Además como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar un restaurante en sociedad con su hermana, pero sabe que logrará concretar con sus propósitos con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Deysi tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de ingredientes al por mayor (arroz, aceite, verduras y azúcar) pues quiere continuar ofreciéndoles lo mejor a sus comensales.
texts.en:
Deysi is 38 years old.  She lives in her own home together with her husband, 40 year-old Víctor, and her young daughter.  This enterprising woman has been in business for one year, making and selling meals (lunchboxes).  She gets up very early in the morning to cook the 50 dishes that she will offer her customers.  She does this six days a week.  Then, at midday, with the help of her sister, she goes to the local market where she leaves the meals with her customers who wait anxiously for her delicious food.  What she doesn't like about her work is that she collects her payment weekly, on a set date.  However, it does allow her to make a good, reliable income.

As Deysi is an enterprising woman, in the future she is planning to set up a restaurant together with her sister.  She knows that she will achieve her goals with a lot of hard work and determination.

This is Deysi's third loan with MFP and she pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner because she doesn't want to make a bad impression on the people who have made her loan possible.  It will allow her to continue working in search of progress.  Deysi is planning to invest her loan in buying ingredients (rice, oil, vegetables and sugar) wholesale as she wants to continue offering her customers the best.

loans.use: To buy basic products such as rice, oil, vegetables and sugar wholesale so that she can continue preparing her meals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Maura Esperanza

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate  se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi , conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

La señora Maura es socia del Banco Comunal desde sus inicios y está muy contenta,  le encanta las reuniones porque en ellas aprende cosas nuevas y en ellas ha hecho nuevas amistades. Tiene 64 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene siete hijos todos mayores pero dos de ellos aun viven con ella. Su marido trabaja en el Municipio de Montecristi.

Se dedica al comercio, tiene un local en su casa donde vende ropa de todo tipo, aunque reconoce que lo que mas vende es ropa de damas y de niñas, pero  no deja de vender ropa de hombre ya que a pesar de que vende menos de igual le dejan ganancias, trabaja todos los días desde las 9am hasta las 18h00 y sus hijos le ayudan cuando ellos tienen tiempo, su mercadería la compra en Portoviejo en una distribuidora al por mayor.

Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, vestidos, blusas, camisas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Su sueño es tener una buena boutique.
texts.en:
The 'María Monserrate' community bank meets every fortnight in Montecristi canton.  This is a place which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts which are well known both nationally and internationally.  It is the home of the famous Panama hat.

Maura has been a member of her community bank since it was first established and she is very happy.  She likes the meetings because she is always learning new things and has made a lot of friendships there.  Maura is 64 years old.  She is married and has seven grown-up children, two of whom still live with her.  Her husband works for the City of Montecristi.

Maura is a saleswoman.  She has premises in her home where she sells all kinds of clothes although she acknowledges that what she sells most of are women's and girls' clothes.  However, she still sells men's clothes because, in spite of the fact that she sells less of them, they also make a profit.  She works every day from 9.00am to 6.00pm and her children help her when they have time.  She buys her merchandise in Portoviejo from a wholesalers.

This loan will be used to buy pants, dresses, blouses, shirts, t-shirts and children's clothes.  Maura's dream is to own a good boutique.

loans.use: To buy pants, dresses, blouses, shirts, t-shirts and children's clothes

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina de 30 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y sus 2 queridos hijos. El negocio al que se dedica es la venta de abarrotería en general, aprovechando que tiene muchos años su tienda es muy conocida en la comarca de los hornos achuapa, ofreciendo a sus clientes productos que son rápidamente comprados, ya que ella sabe muy bien cómo convencerlos y alentarlos a que se lleven más de un solo producto. Este es el primer crédito espera ser muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que desea acceder a más créditos, pues siempre está al pendiente de los productos que solicita.
texts.en: Luz Marina, 30-years-old, is a simple, hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her husband and their two beloved children. She runs a general/grocery store. Due to the fact that her store has been around for many years, it's very well known in the area of Los Hornos Achuapa. She offers her customers popular items and she knows very well how to convince and encourage them to buy more than one product. This is her first loan and she hopes to be very punctual in making her payments because she wants to receive more loans. She always keeps her merchandise up to date.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es: Dionicia, de 49 años, vive al lado de su esposo Víctor de 50 años, de su hijo que es mayor y estudia; juntos se esfuerzan cada día para salir adelante. Esta emprendedora mujer se dedica, desde hace 6 años, a la venta de productos de belleza de una reconocida marca. Realiza su labor durante todos los días y ofrece la mercadería mediante el catálogo con el cual sus clientes le realizan pedidos, y como es conocida ya tiene clientes fijos que le piden con frecuencia. Además en su casa ha logrado adaptar un espacio donde ofrece a sus amigas productos de belleza que tiene en stock, de esta manera obtiene buenas ganancias. Le gusta mucho su labor porque es tranquila, y como pasa  buena cantidad de pedidos al mes, con frecuencia recibe incentivos de la compañía para la que trabaja. Y tiene muchos planes para el futuro como instalar un pequeño bazar en su casa o en el mercado de su zona, pues el espacio de su casa le esta quedando un poco pequeño. Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar progresando en su negocio. Dionicia tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mayor cantidad de productos de belleza, pues quiere ofrecer una buena cantidad de variada mercadería a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Dionicia is 49 years old and lives with her husband, 50 year old Victor, and her adult son who attends school.  They all work together every day to get ahead.  This entrepreneurial woman has been selling a well-known brand of beauty products for the past six years.  She works every day and offers her products through a catalog, through which her customers place their orders with her.  Since she is well known, she has steady customers who order from her often.

She has set aside an area in her home, where she offers the beauty products, that she keeps in stock, to her friends.  In this way she is able to make a good income.

She enjoys her work very much because it’s easy and she gets a good amount of orders each month and often gets incentives from her company.
