The member is Jose Antonio; he is 75 years old, married and has 5 children; the member alternates his daily activities with the arts and crafts business, he sells knits and is also a former employee of the legal system, he has a small store where he sells crafts such as blankets, sweaters and shawls, the member wants to expand the business of selling crafts.  The member requests a loan to buy crafts such as knits.

The member is thankful to who has become part of his dream through this website and commits to make the payments of his loan on time.

loans.use: Buy crafts such as knits.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Rosario socia del banco comunal Loreto, del Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 52 años D. edad, está casada tiene 4 hijos mayores y su esposo se desempeña como conductor D. vehículos (transportista).
La señora Rosario siente la necesidad D. trabajar para no depender D. nadie, así que esta asegurando su vejez gracias a su actividad.
Viene trabajando con los préstamos que ofrece Manuela Ramos desD. hace 4 años, tiempo que le ha servido para comprarse una maquina mas.
Con este préstamo D. S/. 2,300.00 soles comprará 10 kilos D. tela, 4 conos D. hilos D. remalle, 2 conos D. hilo normales, 1 cajita D. agujas, aceite para dar mantenimiento a su máquina y carbón para el motor D. la maquina.
La señora Rosario está muy contenta porque tiene una fuente D. trabajo, que le permite vivir tranquila con su esposo.
texts.en:
Rosario is a member of the Loreto community bank which is in Ucayali department.  She is 52 years old, married, and has 4 grown-up children.  Her husband is a driver (carrier).

Rosario feels the need to work so that she doesn't have to depend on anybody.  In this way she is guaranteeing her old age through her business.

Rosario has been working with Manuela Ramos' loans for 4 years.  During this time she has bought one additional sewing machine.

She will use this loan for 2,300 Peruvian soles to buy 10 kilos of fabric, 4 cones of mending thread, 2 cones of normal thread, 1 box of needles, oil for carrying out maintenance work on her machine and carbon brushes for her machine's motor.

Rosario is very happy because she has a source of work which allows her to live quietly with her husband.

loans.use: To buy 10 kilos of fabric, 4 cones of mending thread, 2 cones of normal thread, 1 box of needles, oil for doing maintenance work on her machine and carbon brushes for her machine's motor

loans.name: Juntos Para El Exito Group

texts.es: Un grupo con mucho en común que es el entusiasmo por surgir en los negocios propios, así es el grupo comunal Juntos para el Éxito una alcancía comunal con características D. éxito. Conformado por 11 integrantes hace más D. ocho meses. Cada integrante se dedica a diversos comercios, tal es así el caso D. L. señora Diana Castañeda D. 24 años D. edad y madre D. un pequeño D. 3 añitos, elL. como todas los días se dedica a L. venta D. comida por las mañanas y por las tarD. ocupa todo su tiempo al cuidado D. su menor hijo. ElL. comenzó en este negocio por iniciativa D. su madre L. cual también se dedica al mismo negocio. Con el esfuerzo D. su trabajo a podido aportar económicamente a su hogar para a si poder seguir saliendo adelante. Con el reciente préstamo lo invertirá en mejoras para su negocio y compra D. mercadería para el mismo. Como L. señora Diana Castañeda cada integrante D. esta alcancía comunal lucha por salir adelante y con gran esfuerzo y dedicación lo consiguen  cada día. Por el bienestar propio y D. sus familias.
texts.en:
The 'Juntos para el Éxito' (Together for Success) communal bank is maD. up of a group of people who have a lot in common, including their enthusiasm for getting ahead in their respective businesses.  The group was founded eight months ago with 11 members.  Each member has their own business.  One of the group's members is Diana Castañeda.  She is 24 years old and has a little one who is 3 years old.  Every day she sells food in the morning and looks after her child in the afternoon.  Her mother is in the same business and it was her mother who suggested she set up her own business.

Through her hard work, Diana has been able to financially support her household so that they can continue to get ahead in life.  She will use this loan to invest in improving her business and to buy merchandise for it.  Like Diana, each member of this communal bank works hard to get ahead and with great effort and determination they manage it every day, for their own well-being and that of their families.

loans.use: To invest in improving her business

loans.name: Camila

texts.es:
La señora Camila es socia del banco comunal Loreto, del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 29 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo.
La señora Camila comenzó su negocio con poco capital, son 5 años que viene recibiendo los prestamos de Manuela Ramos, todo lo ha invertido en su bodega, que cada día esta mas surtida.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.3000.00 soles comprará 5 cajas de panetones de diferentes presentaciones, 10 cajas de chocolate en barra, 3 cajas de leche, 1 caja de mermelada, y también comprara juguetes para surtir más su negocio por estas épocas de la navidad y fin de año.
Su bodega está ubicada en su propia casa, estando ahí puede también estar al cuidado de su hijo, su esposo es comerciante y trabajando los dos están progresando.

La señora Camila está bastante contenta porque gracias a los préstamos de Manuela Ramos puede invertir y ahorrar.
texts.en:
Camila is a member of the Loreto community bank which is located in Ucayali department.  She is 29 years old, married, and has one child.

Camila set up her business with only a small amount of capital.  She has been receiving loans from Manuela Ramos for 5 years.  Each one has been invested in her small grocery store which becomes better stocked every day.

Camila will use this new loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles to buy 5 boxes of different styles of panettone, 10 boxes of bars of chocolate, 3 boxes of milk, 1 box of jam and also some toys so that she can better stock her store during the Christmas and end-of-year season.

Camila's store is located in her own home which means that she can also care for her child.  Her husband is a salesman and together the couple are making progress.

Camila is quite happy because, thanks to the loans from Manuela Ramos, she can invest in her business and also save.

loans.use: To buy 5 boxes of panettones, 10 boxes of bars of chocolate, 3 boxes of milk, 1 box of jam and toys

loans.name: Liz Isabel

texts.es: La señora Liz Isabel A. Q. se dedica a trabajar como obrera de campo desde hace un año aproximadamente , vive en casa propia conjuntamente con su esposo y sus dos hijas , su esposo trabaja como chofer de camiòn desde hace diez años de tal manera que ambos se ayudan en los gastos familiares. Solicita el crèdito para mejoramiento de vivienda y asi tener mejor calidad de vida , se propone otorgarle el crèdito ya que presenta buena experiencia crediticia con tarjetas de crèditos y tambièn cuenta buenas referencias personales.
texts.en:
Liz Isabel A. Q. has been working as a farm laborer for approximately one year.  She lives in her own home together with her husband and two daughters.  Her husband has worked as a truck driver for ten years.  Both she and her husband cover their family expenses.

She is requesting this loan to improve her home so that she can have a better quality of life.  She is able to receive a loan because she has good credit experience with credit cards and she also has good personal references.

loans.use: To improve her home

loans.name: Melchora

texts.es: Melchora, de 45 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de sus 2 hijos, de los cuales solo se preocupa por la menor pues el mayor trabaja y estudia. Cada día esta empeñosa mujer se despierta muy temprano para empezar con la venta de los  artículos para el hogar (platos, tazas y adornos)  y desempeña esta actividad, desde hace 6 años. Esta muy satisfecha pues con los años ha logrado captar gran cantidad de clientes que le compran seguido pues saben de la calidad y los buenos precios que ofrece su mercadería, y como concede a crédito cobra semanalmente o cada quincena, siempre de acuerdo al trato  con los clientes. Le gusta mucho su actividad, pues mientras vende se entretiene conversando y paseando; además sus hijos también le ayudan, de vez en cuando. Ella tiene muchos planes para el futuro como el de instalar un pequeño bazar, en una zona comercial, pues como ya tiene clientes calcula que le ira muy bien. Es el sexto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiete quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Melchora tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería que necesita para surtir mejor su negocio pues tiene varios pedidos que espera concretar.
texts.en:
Melchora, 45, lives in her own house with her two children.  She only tends to the youngest because her oldest daughter works and goes to school.

This enterprising woman rises very early every morning to start selling items for the home (dishes, cups and decorations).  She has been in this business for 6 years.  She is very satisfied because as time has gone by she has managed to capture a good number of regular customers that buy from her often because they are aware of the quality and good prices of her wares.  Also, because she offers credit and collects weekly or biweekly according to her customers’ agreement.

She enjoys her work very much because while she sells she entertains herself chatting and wandering through town.  Besides, her children help her once in a while.

She has a lot of plans for the future like setting up a small store in a commercial area, for example, because she figures she’ll do well because she already has customers.

This is her 6th loan with MFP and she promises to repay punctually because she does not want to disappoint the people who made contributions that will allow her to stay in business seeking progress.

Melchora plans to use the funds to buy merchandise she needs to better stock her business because she has several pending orders to fill.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her business.

loans.name: Margot Bonifacia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “RICCHARY CUSCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Margot Bonifacia; ella tiene 47 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. tienda D. abarrotes y restaurant, la socia trabaja desD. las 7:00 a. hasta las 9:00 p.m, la socia quiere vender panetones, champas, chocolates para la época naviD.ña. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la época naviD.ña.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el pL. establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Margot Bonifacia belongs to the Ricchary Cusco Community Bank which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of the same name.

Margot is 47 years old, married, and has two children. As well as her household duties, she also runs a grocery store and restaurant. She works from 7 am to 9 pm.

Margot wants to take advantage of the Christmas season and sell panetones (a dessert bread), sweaters, and chocolates. She needs a loan to buy these items. She is very grateful to all those donors who are helping her fulfill her dream and promises to make repayments on the loan according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy items for the Christmas season

loans.name: Dios Nos Ama Group

texts.es: Buenas ideas D. negocio y mucha dedicación es lo que caracteriza a este grupo comunal llamado Dios nos Ama conformado por 7 mujeres empeñosas por salir adelante. Conformado hace 4 meses demuestran tener los ánimos indicados para surgir, tal es a si el caso D. una D. las integrante L. señora María Santillán D. 33 años D. edad madre soltera D. 3 hijos, los cuales son su motor D. vida. ElL. por las mañanas atienD. los quehaceres D. L. casa y por las tardes se dedica a L. venta D. anticuchos (una comida típica del país), el cual es el medio D. ingresos económicos y único sustento en su hogar. Con el esfuerzo D. L. venta D. anticuchos a podido salir adelante y darles una educación  a sus hijos el cual siguen en el colegio también ha podido comprarse un terreno en el cual piensa construir su  casa más adelante. Con el reciente préstamo piensa invertir en mejorar el inmueble donD. realiza L. venta D.  anticuchos. Al igual que L. señora María Santillán cada integrante D. L. alcancía comunal Dios nos Ama tiene una historia en particular pero si en algo coinciden es en el entusiasmo y el deseo por salir adelante para el bien D. ellas y D. sus familias.
texts.en:
Good business ideas and a lot of commitment are what characterizes this community bank called 'Dios nos Ama' (God Loves Us).  The group has 7 female members who are determined to get ahead in life.  The group was founded four months ago and the women have shown that they have the necessary drive to succeed.

One of the group's members is 33 year-old María Santillán.  She is a single mother and has three children who are the driving force in her life.  Every morning she takes care of her housework and in the afternoon she sells 'anticuchos' (a type of kebab - a traditional food in this country).  This is how she makes money and it is the only source of financial support for her household.

Through her hard work selling 'anticuchos', María has been able to get ahead in life and give her children an education (they are in high school).  She has also been able to buy a plot of land on which she plans to build a house in the future.  She plans to invest her loan in improving the building from which she sells her 'anticuchos'.  Just like María Santillán, each member of the 'Dios nos Ama' community bank has their own story to tell but what they have in common is their enthusiasm and their desire to get ahead for the good of themselves and their families.

loans.use: To invest in improving the building from which she sells her 'anticuchos' (kebabs)

loans.name: Maria Belen

texts.es:
La señora María es socia del banco comunal Las Perlas de Manantay, del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos menores.
La señora María se dedica a la venta de comida al paso, esta actividad la realiza en la afueras de su propia casa, negocio que genera ingresos y le permite ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, además que puede atender a sus hijos durante la mañana y parte de la tarde.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,200.00 comprará 3 mesas y 12 sillas de plásticos, 3 manteles, 2 galones de aceite, un escurridor, servilletas, 1 docena de vasos, 2 kilos de chuño, 1  doc. De tenedores, 2 cajitas de mondadientes.
La señora María está muy contenta porque su negocio ha sido el comienzo de su pequeño proyecto y desea, más adelante, poder tener uno mucho más implementado, pero poco apoco lo va ha lograr, agradece a Manuela Ramos por el apoyo económico.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the Las Perlas de Manantay communal bank, in the Ucayali Department. She is 39 years old, and married, with 5 young children.

Maria works selling fast food, which she does just outside of her home. This business generates income and allows her to help her husband with the household expenses. She is also able to tend to her children in the mornings and part of the afternoons.

With this loan she will purchase 3 tables and 12 plastic chairs, 3 tablecloths, 2 gallons of oil, a dish rack, napkins, 1 dozen glasses, 2 kilos of flour, 1 dozen forks, and 2 boxes of toothpicks. 

Maria is very happy because this business is the beginning of her small project. She hopes in the future to have even more, but she is getting there little by little, and appreciates the financial support of Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: Purchase 3 tables, 12 plastic chairs, 3 tablecloths, 2 gallons of oil, a dish rack, napkins, a dozen glasses, 2 kilos of flour, a dozen forks, etc.

loans.name: Virginia Azucena

texts.es: La Sra. Hernández es una mujer acostumbrada a trabajar ella es divorciada y nunca ha tenido necesidad de depender de alguien todos sus hijos estan casados y cada quien vive con su ahora familia como ha ella no le gusta molestarlos es por eso que en este momento se dedica a la venta de ropa usada ya tiene cuatro años con dicha venta y le esta funcionando muy bien, para lo que decea el crédito es para invertir en su negocio y agrandar sus utilidades.
texts.en: La Señora Hernández is used to working.  She is divorced and has never had to depend on anyone.  All her children are married and live with their respective families.  She doesn't want to bother them, and therefore she sells used clothing.  She has been doing this very successfully for four years.  She wishes to invest the loan proceeds in her business and increase profits.

loans.use: Purchase of clothing for inventory.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.es: Milagros, de 37 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su esposo Manuel de 38 años, que es minero y de sus 4 hijos menores de edad. Cada día esta emprendedora mujer se despierta muy temprano para atender a sus hijos, además abre su tienda que esta ubicada en su casa. En su negocio brinda el servicio de corte de cabello y peinados, por lo que esta muy satisfecha porque obtiene regulares ganancias, y como es tranquilo no descuida la crianza de sus hijos, que aún son muy pequeños. Además de este negocio instaló en el mismo lugar una pequeña vitrina donde ofrece útiles escolares, y también, desde hace 2 años, realiza el servicio de fotocopias, y ambos negocios tienen bastante acogida porque en su zona no hay competencia. Por todos sus logros esta muy satisfecha y tiene muchos planes para el futuro como el de surtir mejor su tienda e implementar su salón de belleza con mejores instrumentos de peluquería. Es el  primer crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Milagros tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de cantidad de juguetes pues quiere surtir mejor su vitrina para aprovechar esta campaña navideña que ya se encuentra próxima, además tiene varios pedidos pendientes.
texts.en: Thirty-seven-year-old Milagros lives in her own home with her husband, Manuel, who is 38 years old and a miner, and their four young children.  Each day this enterprising woman wakes up very early to take care of her children and open her store, which is located in her home.  She cuts and styles hair; she is very pleased with this work because it gives her a steady income.  Since she is relaxed, she is able to properly care for her children, who are still very young.  She also installed a small glass case from which she displays school supplies, and, for the last two years, she has provided photocopy service.  Both of these businesses have been doing well because there is no competition nearby.  She is very satisfied with her accomplishments and has many plans for the future, such as more comprehensive inventory for her store and more equipment for her beauty salon.  This is her first loan from MFP (local lending institution), and she promises to make her payments on time.  She doesn't want to disappoint those who have made it possible for her to continue working and seeking progress.  Milagros plans to invest this loan in a large number of toys to better supply her store and take advantage of this Christmas season.  Also, she already has several orders.

loans.use: Purchase a large number of toys to sell this Christmas season.

loans.name: Edith Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “RICCHARY CUSCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Edith Elena; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones, blusas, chompas y polos, ella trae de lugares como Bolivia en forma independiente y lo lleva a las diferentes tiendas para vender la ropa, la socia quiere tener una tienda para vender la ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa al por mayor.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Edith Elena, 39, is a member of the “RICCHARY CUSCO” communal bank located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is single and has a son.  She alternates her daily chores with clothing sales.  She sells pants, blouses, sweaters and polo-type shirts.  She brings the merchandise from places like Bolivia independently and takes it to various stores to sell.  She’d like to have a store to sell the clothes in.  She is asking for funds to buy clothes at wholesale.

She thanks those who are part of her dream and promises to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Katy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PROSPERIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Katy; ella tiene 31 años de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza y venta de pollos, la socia también se dedica a la venta de carne ambos negocios lo vende en el mercado de vinocanchon en el distrito de San Jeronimo.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mas insumos para sus negocios.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Katy, 31, is a member of the “PROSPERIDAD” (Prosperity) communal bank located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is married and has two children.  She alternates her daily chores with raising chickens.  She also sells meat.  She sells both in San Jeronimo district’s Vinocanchon Market.

She is asking for funds to buy more ingredients for her businesses.

She thanks all those who share her dream and promises to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her business.

loans.name: 10 Estrellas Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama 10 ESTRELLAS. Significa que son diez integrantes y les gusta soñar viendo las estrellas. Esta ubicado en san Juan Tilapa, Estado de México. El grupo está conformado por  10 integrantes. La Sra. Antonia es una integrante  del grupo  quien tiene 33 años. Tiene 5 hijos, 3 mujeres y 2  varones. Se dedica a las labores del campo y vende dulces, solicito su préstamo para invertir en su negocio y poder adquirir productos dada la cercanía de las fechas de fin de año. Ella es una mujer que pese a ser trabajadora del campo busca  opciones de ingreso para mantener su familia lo mejor posible y con menos carencias. Es feliz de saber que puede contribuir con su esfuerzo y sueña que en el futuro su condición económica mejore.Observación: la señora Esperanza se movio al momento de capturar la foto.
texts.en:
The group is called 10 ESTRELLAS (10 Stars).  It means that there are 10 members and they like to dream gazing at the stars.  It is located in San Juan Tilapia, México state.  The group has 10 members.

Antonia is one of the group members.  She is 33 years old and has five children, three girls and two boys.

She works in the fields but also sells candy.  She asked for a loan to invest in her business to be able to buy products due to the nearness of end of year dates.

She is a woman who despite being a field worker seeks other income options to support her family the best way possible with fewer wants.  She is happy to know that she can contribute with her effort and dreams that her economic situation will improve in the future.

Observation:  Esperanza moved at the moment the photo was taken.

loans.use: To invest in their sales.

loans.name: Quenida

texts.es: Quenida, D. 36 años, vive en su casa propia al lado D. su esposo Denis D. 40 años, que es taxista  y sus 3 hijos, que están en edad escolar; juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. DesD. hace 3 años, esta trabajadora mujer se dedica al alquiler D. 2 autos, que elL. misma administra, y esta muy satisfecha pues las ganancias que obtiene le permiten ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar. Manifiesta que no es fácil porque debió buscar  chóferes D. confianza y además siempre esta atenta a los desperfectos que puedan presentar los vehículos. Lo que no le gusta es que algunas veces los chóferes, que trabajan para elL., se retrasan en el pago diario que le deben dar, y esto perjudica el movimiento del capital. Pero a pesar D. los problemas sabe que saldrá adelante pues su esposo, que es chofer le brinda buenos consejos que le sirven para avanzar; también tiene muchos planes futuros como comprar más autos e instalar una flota D. taxis. Es el séptimo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Quenida tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en brindarle mantenimiento a sus autos, pues han presentado algunas imperfecciones y elL. quiere ofrecer el mejor servicio a los pasajeros que suben, D. esta manera sabe que mejorará sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Quenida, 36, lives in her own house with her husband, Denis, 40, who is a taxi driver, and their three school age children.  Together they struggle to get ahead daily.

For the last three years this hard working woman leases out two vehicles that she herself administers.  She is very satisfied with the profits she earns which allow her to help her husband meet household expenses.

She states that it isn’t easy because she had to find trustworthy drivers and she always has to be aware of any mechanical problems the vehicles may have.  

What she dislikes is that sometimes a driver working for her falls back on the daily payments he’s supposed to give her and this impedes capital circulation.  Despite the problems, though, she knows that she will get ahead because her husband, who is a driver, gives her good advice that is useful to her advancement.  She has a lot of plans for the future like buying more vehicles to have a taxi fleet.

This is her 7th loan with MFP and she promises to repay on time in order not to disappoint the people who maD. this contribution that will allow her to stay in business seeking progress.

Quenida plans to use the loan to service her vehicles because they are experiencing some mechanical problems and she wants to proviD. better service to passengers they pick up.  She knows that her profits will improve this way.

loans.use: For vehicle maintenance and repair.

loans.name: Rosendo

texts.es: El sr. Rosendo V. es una persona y muy trabajadora y honrada y se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia, el trabaja todo el dia como mecanico en un taller y requiere de este prestamo para terminar la contruccion de un cuarto en su vivienda, ya que se preocupa por darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, poco a poco le ha hecho mejoras a su vivienda, Gracias a que es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo, el Señor Rosendo y su familia les agradecen el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Rosendo V. is a very hard-working and honest person who cares for his family's well-being.  He works all day as a mechanic in a garage and he requires this loan to finish building a room in his house since he would like to provide his family with a better quality of life.  Little by little he has made improvements to his house because he is a man who is very committed to his work.  Rosendo and his family are thankful for the support offered to them.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora Juana es socia del banco comunal Las Perlas de Manantay, del Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad.  Su esposo se desempeña como  empleado de una compañía.
La señora Juana tiene una vulcanizadora (centro de reparación de motocicletas) en su casa, negocio que viene implementando poco a poco,  también está  generando  trabajo a otras personas, trabaja junto a ella un joven a quien le paga los fines de semana.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 soles, comprará una plancha para el parchado, una comprensora, alicates, un paquete de llaves, una caja de parches,  un kilo de grasa, un desarmador grande, ½ docena de cámaras, y rodajes.
La señora Juana se ha trazado una meta, el de tener un autoservicio muy bien implementado, para poder darles estudios a sus hijos sin que nada les falte. Gracias a Manuela Ramos podrá alcanzar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the Las Perlas de Manantay (Pearls of Manantay) communal bank in Ucayali department.  She is 32 years old, married and has three minor children.  Her husband is an employee of a firm.

Juana has a motorcycle repair shop in her home, a business she has been equipping little by little.  She is also generating work for other people; she employs a young man that works alongside her that she pays each weekend.

She will use this new 1500 sol loan to buy a patching iron, a compressor, pliers, a set of wrenches, a box of patches, a kilo of grease, a large screwdriver, half a dozen inner tubes and gears.

Juana has set a goal for herself: to have a very well equipped vehicle repair shop in order to provide schooling and everything else they may need for her children.  Thanks to Manuela Ramos she will be able to reach her dreams.

loans.use: To buy motorcycle spare parts and other supplies.

loans.name: Urbana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PROSPERIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Urbana; ella tiene 29 años de edad, soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurante ella vende todos los días lo que es almuerzo, cena y extras. La socia es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar su negocio y comprar una refrigeradora para su restaurante.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Urbana is a member of the 'Prosperidad' (Prosperity) community bank which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of the same name.

Urbana is 29 years old.  She is single and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her restaurant business where she serves lunches, dinners and extras every day.  She is an enterprising woman who has a great desire to get ahead in life.

She is requesting this loan to improve her business and buy a refrigerator for her restaurant.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and she pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To improve her business and buy a refrigerator for her restaurant

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: El señor Humberto S.,es un hombre muy responsable en su trabajo, cada fin de semana sale muy temprano su puesto donde vende ropa usada, el es divorciado desde hace muchos años,y vive solo pero se preocupa por su bienestar y por su patrimonio en la vejez, sus hijos vivien fuera de la ciudad, el trabaja mucho pensando en ellos, ya que cada semana les envia dinero para su educacion, es por eso que el solicita este prestamo, para la compra de mas mercancia como, ropa y aparatos electricos para aumentar sus ventas y asi tener mas ingresos.
texts.en: Humberto S. is a very responsible man in his job.  Every weekend he leaves very early for his stand where he sells used clothing.  He has been divorced for many years, and lives alone, but he is worried about his well-being and about his wealth when he is older.  His children live outside of the city, and he works a lot thinking about them, since he sends them money every week for their education.  For this reason he is requesting the loan, so that he can buy more merchandise, such as clothing and electrical appliances, in order to increase his sales and have more income.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for his sales business.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PROSPERIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Violeta; ella tiene 29 años de edad, conviviente; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes siendo su horario de trabajo desde las 09:00am hasta las 09:00pm siendo este el unico medio de trabajo por el momento,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar y leche.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mas insumos para su negocio.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Ms. Violeta belongs to the "Prosperidad" ["Prosperity"] communal bank.  This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

Violeta is 29 years old and lives with her partner.  She alternates her daily activities with running her business, which is a grocery store.  Her work schedule is from 9:00 am until 9:00 pm and this is her only work at this time.  She sells staple items such as rice, sugar, and milk.

She is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for her business.

Violeta is grateful to all those who, through this means, will support her dream.  She also promises to make her repayments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy more products for her grocery store

loans.name: Leiner

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PROSPERIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Srta. Leiner; ella tiene 24 años de edad, soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes el cual lo administra su mama,la socia estudia por las mañanas y por las tardes le ayuda a su mama.
 
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mas insumos para la tienda de abarrotes.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Miss Leiner belongs to the "Prosperidad" ["Prosperity"] communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

Leiner is 24 years old and single.  She alternates her daily activities with working in her mother's grocery store.  Leiner goes to school in the mornings and helps her mother in the afternoons. She is requesting this loan to by more goods for the grocery store.

Leiner is grateful to all those who, through this means, will support her dream. She also promises to make her repayments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her mother's grocery store

loans.name: Rosula Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Rosula es socia del banco comunal Las Perlas de Manantay, del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 38 años, está casada y tiene 4 hijos menores de edad.  Su esposo es comerciante y la apoya en los gastos de la casa.
Hace algún tiempo estuvo trabajando en la confección de prendas de vestir, con las máquinas que tenía podía trabajar, pero necesitaba capital.  Cuando ingresó al banco comunal de Manuela Ramos le dieron un primer préstamo de S/. 300.00 soles, con el cual pudo comprar telas al por mayor.
La señora Rosula trabaja con Manuela Ramos desde hace dos años y medio, gracias a los préstamos otorggados ha podido comprar una maquina más y materiales que necesitaba para confeccionar prendas de vestir.
Con este préstamo de S/. 2,500.00 soles comprará 15 metros de tela algodón, para la confección de ropas interiores, 2 conos de elásticos, 3 conos de hilo de remalle, 6 conos de hilo de diferentes colores,  3 kilos de  licra para la elaboración de blusas, y 5 metros de tela chalis.
La señora Rosula está muy tranquila y alegre porque puede aportar un poquito de dinero a su hogar.
texts.en:
Rosuela is a member of the Las Perlas de Manantay (Pearls of Manantay) communal bank in Ucayali department.  She is 38 years old, married and has four minor children.  Her husband is a merchant and helps her with household expenses.

Some time ago she was working making clothes.  She was able to work with the machines she had but she lacked capital.  When she joined the Manuela Ramos communal bank they gave her an initial loan of 300 soles that she used to buy fabric at wholesale.

Rosuela has been collaborating with Manuela Ramos for two and a half years.  Thanks to the loans she’s been granted she was able to buy another machine and supplies she needed to make the clothes.

With this 2500 sol loan she will buy 15 meters of cotton fabric to make underwear, 2 cones of elastic, 2 cones of mending thread, 6 cones of thread of assorted colors, 3 kilos of Lycra to make blouses and 5 meters of mohair.

Rosuela is content and very happy because she can contribute a bit of money to her home.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials and supplies.

loans.name: Emprendedores De Vitarte Group

texts.es: Personas empeñosas por salir adelante y progresar en la vida, a si son los integrantes de la alcancía comunal Emprendedores de Vitarte conformado por 7 socios en su mayoría mujeres. Una alcancía nueva que tiene un solo objetivo, el salir adelante y obtener triunfos económicos. Un caso en particular es el de la señora Pilar Q. de 42 años de edad casada y madre de 6 hijos de los cuales 3 aun son menores de edad. Ella se dedica a la fabricación y venta de yogur natural de forma artesanal también por las mañanas se dedica a la venta de comida. Los ingresos que genera de la venta de comida y de yogur la invierte especialmente en la educación de sus hijos y ahorros para el hogar, mas adelante le gustaría implementar maquinas para la elaboración de yogur. Con el presente préstamo lo invertirá en insumos para la elaboración de yogur. Al igual que la señora Pilar Q. cada integrante de la alcancía Emprendedores de Vitarte tiene una iniciativa de negocio que con esfuerzo están dispuestos a llevarlo a cabo,  no puedo concluir sin mencionar el esfuerzo y dedicación que ponen todos los días para el bienestar de sus familias y  negocios propios.
texts.en:
People eager to get ahead and make progress in life--that describes the members of the communal bank "Emprendedores de Vitarte" [Entrepreneurs of Vitarte], made up of seven members who are mostly women. A new bank which has just one objective, to get ahead and achieve economic triumphs. 

One case in particular is that of Pilar Q., 42 years of age, married and mother of six children of whom three are minors. She works in the production and sale of natural yogurt by traditional methods. In the mornings she also works selling prepared food. She invests the income generated by the sale of prepared food and yogurt especially in the education of her children and in savings for the home. 

In the future she would like to set up machinery for making yogurt. She will invest the current loan in supplies for making yogurt. Like Pilar Q., each member of the bank "Emprendedores de Vitarte" has a business initiative which he/she is motivated to carry out. 

I cannot finish without mentioning the effort and dedication they all demonstrate on a daily basis for the wellbeing of their families and their own businesses.

loans.use: To invest in yogurt-making supplies

loans.name: Risueñas De Calimaya Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama RISUEÑAS DE CALIMAYA se encuentra ubicado en Calimaya en México. Está conformado por 10 integrantes entre ellas está la Sra. Teresa S. quien vende tortillas hechas a mano desde hace 2 años, nos comenta que desde que era casi una niña su mamá le enseñó a hacerlas ya que dejó la escuela por problemas económicos. La señora nos comenta que decidió iniciar su negocio porque los ingresos de su esposo muchas veces no le alcanzaba para cubrir las necesidades de su familia, tiene dos hijos que actualmente estudian el bachillerato.El crédito lo quiere para comprar maiz, incrementar sus ingresos y tener la oportunidad de brindarles a sus hijos educación.
texts.en: This group is called "Risueñas de Calimaya" ["Smiles of Calimaya"] and can be found in Calimaya, in Mexico state.  The group is made up of 10 members, among them Ms. Teresa S..  She has been selling hand-made tortillas for more than two years.  She tells us that her mother taught her how to make them almost since she was a baby, and that she left school because of economic problems.  She says that she decided to start her business because her husband's income was often not enough to cover the needs of their family.  She has two children who are currently studying in secondary school.  She will use this loan to buy corn, in order to increase her earnings and have the opportunity to provide for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy corn by the barrel

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
La señora Flor de María es socia del banco comunal De La Amistad II, del Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 39 años, está casada y tiene 3 hijos.
Lleva trabajando con Manuela Ramos desde hace 5 años, su esposo se desempeña como obrero.
Tiene una pequeña bodega instlada en su propia casa, la misma que está sacando adelante con mucha dedicación y lo hace sin descuidar a sus hijos que todavía necesitan de sus cuidados. 
con éste préstamo de s/. 2,000.00 soles comprará 2 sacos de arroz, 2 sacos de azúcar, 1 caja de aceite, 2 cajas de leche, 2 cajas de galletas, 1 caja de jabón, 5 casilleros de huevo, 1 caja de chocolate, 2 cajas de paneton, 5 paquetes de papel higiénico, 1 paquete de sal, 2 bolsas de fideo, 1 caja de conservas.
La señora Flor de María da gracias a Dios y a Manuela Ramos por todo lo que hasta el momento ha logrado, porque sin los préstamos no lo hubiera logrado. 
En la foto se muestra junto a su hija.
texts.en:
Flor de María is a member of the De la Amistad II (Of Friendship II) communal bank in Ucayali department.  She’s 39 years old, married and has three children.

She has been collaborating with Manuela Ramos for the last 5 years.  Her husband is a laborer.

She has a small general store in her home that she is helping succeed through much dedication although not neglecting her children who still need her care.

With this 2000 sol loan she will buy: 2 sacks of rice, 2 sacks of sugar, 1 case of cooking oil, 2 cases of milk, 2 cases of cookies, 1 case of soap, 5 flats of eggs, 1 case of chocolate, 2 cases of Panettones (bread popular during the Christmas season), 5 packages of toilet paper, 1 package of salt, 2 bags of noodles, 1 case of canned goods.

Flor de María thanks God and Manuela Ramos for all she has accomplished to date because without the loans she would have not accomplished it.

In the photo she appears with her daughter.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Efrain Juan

texts.es: EL SEÑOR EFRAIN JUAN J. B.  TIENE ACTUALMENTE  37 AÑOS DE EDAD, EL ES CASADO Y TIENE DOS HIJOS, DE 8 Y 2 AÑOS, EL MAYOR ASISTE AL COLEGIO, EL SEÑOR EFRAIN TRABAJA COMO CHOFER DE UNA UNIDAD MENOR (MOTOTAXI) LA CUAL LA UTILIZA TODO EL DIA, SU ESPOSA LO APOYA EN LA CANASTA FAMILIAR PUESTO QUE ELLA ES TRABAJADORA DEPENDIENTE, NECESITA EL PRESTAMO PARA EL MANTENIENTO DE SU UNIDAD DE TRABAJO QUE ESTA SUFRIENDO ALGUNOS DESPERFECTOS
texts.en: Señor Efraín Juan J. Bendezú is 37 years old. He is married with 2 children, aged 8 and 2 years old, the elder of whom attends school. Señor Efraín works as the driver of a mototaxi, which he does all day long. His wife helps him with the family's expenses, as she is employed. He needs the loan for the maintenence of his mototaxi, which has suffered some damage.

loans.use: He needs the loan to repair his mototaxi

loans.name: Alma Emprendedora Group

texts.es: El grupo Alma Emprendedora cuenta con 11 integrantes, el grupo fue nombrado asi porque todas las clientas tienen en común las ganas de emprender una lucha diaria en su negocios asi como en la vida misma, y prueba de ello es que han formado el grupo para obteber un beneficio. Fabiola V. iniciadora del grupo es actualmente la tesorera,  tiene 28 años, tiene 3 hijos( 2 varones y 1 mujer) estudió hasta la primaria. Ama de casa y comerciante invierte su credito en  material galvanizado para hacer artículos de fantasía.Inició su hogar con un par de cuartos modestos solo de tabique y lámina de cartón, anteriormente tenía una tienda de abarrotes (casi 6 años) así se inició en el comercio tambien de dulces  y refrescos  por lo cual redujo su casa a un solo cuarto para establecer su negocio. Posteriormente decidió cerrar la tienda por el motivo del espacio en su casa pero gracias a sus ahorros y a los creditos emprende el negocio en la venta de fantasia el cual puede realizar en sus ratos libres. Con el credito pretende hacer crecer su negocio y futuro hacer crecer su casa.
texts.en:
The Alma Emprendedora ["Entrepreneurial Soul"] group has 11 members.  The group got its name because all of the members share a desire to undertake the daily struggles both of their businesses and of their lives.  The fact that they have formed this group in order to gain a benefit is proof of this.  

Fabiola V., who started the group, is now the treasurer.  She is 28 years old, has three children (two boys and one girl), and studied until primary school.  She is a homemaker and a businesswoman and she will invest her loan in galvanized metal for making novelty items.

She started her home with a pair of modest rooms made only from brick and pegboard.  She used to have a small grocery store (for almost six years) and this is how she got into business.  She also sold sweets and soft drinks.  In order to establish her business, she had to reduce her home to only one room.  Later, she decided to close the store because of space reasons in her house.  Thanks to her savings and the loans she received, she undertook her current business of selling novelty items, which she is able to do in her free time.  She intends to use this loan to grow her business and, in the future, to expand her house.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal for making novelty items

loans.name: Monserrate Encarnacion

texts.es:
Monserrate de 45 años, vende ropa y peluches recorriendo las calles del Guasmo. Vive  en una zona periurbana caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes informales. 

Comenzó a vender ropa desde muy joven, confeccionándola y vendiéndola en las calles del Guasmo. Con el esfuerzo de todos los días pudo tener una clientela fija. En la actualidad trabaja vendiendo ropa y peluches muy económicos en un puesto  en la calle ubicado en una zona del Guasmo que es un poco peligrosa. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar peluches y ropa de segunda mano para vender a un mas volumen. En el futuro quiere tener una papelería en su casa.
texts.en:
Monserrate, who is 45 years old, sells clothing and cuddly toys in the streets of Guasmo. She lives on the outskirts of the city, where the majority of people are informal traders. 

She started selling clothes when she was very young, making and selling them in the streets of Guasmo. With time she was able to develop a solid customer base. Now she works selling clothing and very good value soft toys from a stall located in a neighbourhood of Guasmo that can be a little dangerous. 

With the loan she wants to buy toys and second hand clothes to sell in greater volume. In the future she would like to open a stationery shop in her house.

loans.use: Clothing, soft toys

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es:
Gloria de 51 años, tiene una pequeña papelería en la parte delantera de su casa en conjunto a su esposo quien tiene alado una ebanistería. Viven en una zona urbana llamada suburbio.  

Ella comenzó a trabajar con unos cuadernos, plumas, bisutería poco a poco y con ayuda de su esposo ya que lo conocían por el sector porque él es ebanista y hace todo tipo de muebles. Ella trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 17h00pm vendiendo las cosas que tiene en la papelería. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar cuadernos, plumas y ayudar a su esposo a su esposo comprando madera para la producción de los muebles. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa ya que ahora es de ladrillos.
texts.en:
Gloria, who is 51, has a small stationery shop in the front part of her house, together with her husband, who has a cabinet-maker's shop beside it. They live in a built-up area on the edge of the city. 

Gloria began ittle by little with a few notebooks, pens, and trinkets. Her husband helped her, because he was already well known in the area as a cabinet-maker. He makes all types of furniture. She works from 8am until 5pm selling things in her stationery shop.

With the loan she wants to buy notebooks and pens, and help her husband in buying wood for his furniture-making. In the future she wants to finish their house, because at the moment it is just bare bricks.

loans.use: Notebooks, wood

loans.name: Hugo Enrique

texts.es:
Hugo, reside en Corinto, departamento de Morazán, tiene 25 años de edad, administra una tienda de la cual obtiene los ingresos para dar la alimentación y salud a su esposa y su hija Nohemí de 2 años de edad, este negocio tiene 3 años de existir y surge por iniciativa propia, él con su esposa lo atienden sin horario fijo.
Actualmente el necesita comprar mercadería para el negocio ya que por las fiestas de fin de año que se acercan quiere preparase desde ya, por lo que solicita un préstamo para la compra de artículos de primera necesidad, ayudando así a que el negocio este preparado para atender la demanda y ofrezca un mejor servicio a los clientes.
Él sueño de Hugo es poseer un negocio estable que le garantice ingresos para solventar las necesidades del hogar y le permita ir creciendo en el mercado.
texts.en:
Hugo, who lives in Corinto in the Department of Morazán, is 25 years old. He runs a store, which provides what he needs to ensure that his wife and 2 year old daughter Nohemí have their health and enough to eat. He has had the business since he started it on his own initiative 3 years ago. He and his wife serve in the shop, without a fixed schedule. 

Now he needs to buy merchandise for the store, because he wants to be prepared for the approaching festive season. He is therefore seeking a loan for the purchase of basic household goods, so that the store will be well-prepared to meet demand and offer a better service to customers.

Hugo's dream is to have a solid business which guarantees him sufficient income to meet the needs of the household and permit him to expand his market.

loans.use: To buy household products

loans.name: Karen Margarita

texts.es:
Karen de 20 años, tiene una pequeña papelería en la parte delantera de su casa, es madre soltera. Vive en una zona urbana llamada suburbio caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes informales. 

Escogió tener una papelería porque su hijo pequeño necesitaba tener una mejor viva económica ya que es madre soltera. Poco a poco con esfuerzo pudo comprar diversa papelería, cuadernos, plumas. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 08h00am vendiendo cuadernos a $ 1.00, plumas, lápices, papelería etc. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar cuadernos, plumas, papelería y otros artículos para su papelería. En el futuro quiere seguir con su negocio y si es posible agrandarlo más con mas mercadería.
texts.en:
Karen, who is a 20 year old single mother, has a small stationery shop in the front part of her house. She lives in a built-up area on the edge of the city, where most of the inhabitants are informal traders.

She chose to have a stationery shop because her little son needed to have a better life economically, because she is a single mother. Little by little, with a lot of effort, she was able to buy a range of stationery items, notebooks and pens. At the moment she works from 8am, selling one-dollar notebooks, pens, pencils, paper, etc.

With the loan she wants to buy similar items for her stationery shop. In future she wants to continue with her business and if possible expand with more merchandise.

loans.use: Notebooks, pens, stationery

loans.name: Juana  Antonia

texts.es:
Doña Juana, tiene 56 años D. edad, resiD. en Corinto departamento D. Morazán, se dedica a la crianza D. ganado y cerdos; Doña Juana vive con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposo y tres hijos, este oficio lo aprendió desD. pequeña porque sus padres se dedicaron a la crianza D. ganado, pero a ella su esposo le ayuda ya que es costoso y requiere fuerza.
Ella tiene el proyecto D. comprar una ternera y dos cerdos así como también la alimentación para vario tiempo, por lo que solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra, dicho préstamo le ayudara a crecer con su granja y a continuar con esta labor que por años a realizado.
Sueña con tener mucho ganado y cerdos y que a través D. este negocio pueda mejorar las condiciones en su hogar y que sus hijos tengan acceso a la educación.
texts.en:
Juana is 56 years old and lives in Corinto in the Morazan department.  She raises cows and pigs.  Juana lives with her family, consisting of her husband and 3 children.  She learned this traD. when she was small because her parents also raised livestock.  Her husband helps her because the work is difficult and requires strength.

Juana has plans to buy a female calf and 2 pigs and also some feed for the animals.  She requests a loan to make these purchases.  This loan will help her to expand her farm and continue on with the work that she has done for years.  

She dreams of having a lot of cows and pigs, so that through this business she could improve the condition of her home and so that her children could have access to an education.

loans.use: to buy a female calf and pigs

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es:
residen en San Miguel, departamento D. San Miguel, ella trabaja D. 7:00am a 8:00 pm atendiendo su negocio donD. ofrece productos D. primera necesidad, su ventaja en que el lugar no hay otra tienda por lo que no tiene competencia.
Ella actualmente tiene la necesidad D. invertir en el negocio y comprar ropa, para intentar un nuevo comercio dentro D. su negocio, por lo que solicita un préstamo para esta inversión, y así ir creciendo y diversificando el negocio.
Su visión es tener un negocio amplio y lleno D. mercadería como un mini súper para atender a todos los clientes y vecinos cercanos.
texts.en:
Maria Angela lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department.  She works from 7.00am to 8.00pm serving in her business where she sells convenience store items.  Her advantage is that there is no other store in the area so she has no competition.

Maria Angela currently needs to invest in her business and would like to buy some clothes to try out a new sideline within her business.  She is requesting a loan to make this investment so that she can continue growing and diversifying her business.

Her vision is to have a large business which is full of merchandise like a mini supermarket so that she can serve all her customers and neighbors.

loans.use: To buy clothes and other necessary products for her store

loans.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon is a 34-year-old single man living in Saida. Simon is a taxi driver since 18 years of age, and it’s his only way of making a living. Simon is well known in his area and he has a very good reputation. Simon is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua for the second time in order to pay for what’s left on the cost of the car he bought to improve his business. His first loan was for improving his business, and it did. Simon hopes to open a private taxi company in the future.

loans.use: To pay for car bought to improve business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase a motorcycle and spare parts for workshop

loans.name: Gonzalo Adalberto

texts.es:
Don Gonzalo, tiene 56 años de edad, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y dos nietos, residen en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután,  don Gonzalo tiene cerca de 40 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, una manera de trabajar y llevar a su hogar la alimentación.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos necesarios para el cultivo de maíz y de plátanos, su inversión le ayudara a contar con lo necesario para realizar la siembra comprando abono, tratamiento de plagas y fertilizantes, con esta ayuda fortalecerá su cultivo y podrá tener una buena producción.
Su proyección es seguir contando con ánimos y salud para continuar trabajando la tierra, recibiendo las mejores cosechas en cada temporada, para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Don Gonzalo is 56 years old and is a farmer. He live with his wife and 2 grandchildren in the Jiquilisco department of Usulután. Don Gonzalo has been working in agriculture for around 40 years, a way of working and bringing food to his family. He is seeking a loan to purchase the necessary products for his maize and plantain crops. His investment will help him to have what is necessary to sow the crops, including manure, plague treatments and fertiliser. With this help Don Gonzalo will strengthen his crop and be able to have good production. His plan is to continue to be lively and healthy to continue working on the land, reaping the best harvests each season, to help his family.

loans.use: Purchase manure, plague treatments and fertiliser

loans.name: Maira

texts.es:
Maira, reside en Jiquilisco, departamento de Usulután, tiene 32 años de edad, se dedica a la venta en un chalet donde ofrece lo necesario para el hogar, vive con sus hijos. Tiene como 8 años de dedicarse al negocio con el chalet.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para el chalet ya que su demanda aumenta y quiere contar con un buen inventario de mercadería para ofrecer  a los clientes.
Con esta inversión ella espera fortalecer el negocio y ofrecer un mejor servicio y atención a los clientes, con la oportunidad de mejorar los ingresos de la familia. Sueña con tener un chalet muy estable y mejorar la condición de vida de sus hijos para que estos puedan estudiar y mejorar sus conocimientos.
texts.en: Maira lives in Jiquilisco in the Usulután department. She is 32 year sold and has a sales business in a chalet that offers all necessary items for the home. She lives with her children and has been working at this business with the chalet for 8 years. Maira is seeking a loan to purchase merchandise for the chalet as demand has increased and she wants to have good levels of inventory to offers her customers. With this investment Maira hopes to reinforce the business and offer a better service and attention to customers, with the opportunity of improving the earnings for her family. She dreams of having a stable chalet and improving the living conditions of her children so that they can study and improve their knowledge.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Mirla Soraya

texts.es:
La señora Mirla es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras, del Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y tiene 1 hijo menor.  Su esposo se desempeña como docente (profesor).
La señora Mirla lleva año y medio trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de comida (desayunos), esta actividad la desarrolla en el patio de su casa, de esa manera le queda tiempo para atender a su hijo y hacer otras cosas más.
Con este nuevo prestamos de S/. 1,000.00 soles comprará 5 bolsas de cemento, 1 metro de ripio, 4 varillas de fierro, para arreglar el piso de su patio y tener más comodidad para atender a sus clientes.
Co los ingresos que obtiene de su venta está comprando cosas que le hacían mucha falta en su hogar, y lo bueno es que puede ayudar a su esposo con algunos gastos.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por brindar a las mujeres esa oportunidad  de poder acceder a un  pequeño crédito, con el que puedan iniciar su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Mirla is a member of the 'Las Almendras' community bank which is located in Ucayali department.  She is 31 years old, married, and has one dependent child.  Her husband is a teacher.  Mirla has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for one and a half years.  She has a small business where she sells meals (breakfasts).  She runs her business from the open space directly outside her house.  This means that she also has time to look after her child and do other things.

She will use this loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles to buy 5 bags of cement, 1 meter of gravel and 4 iron rods to fix the ground outside her home so that she can serve her customers more comfortably.

Mirla is using the profits she makes in her business to buy things which she really needs for her home and the great thing is that she can help her husband with some expenses.

Mirla is grateful to Manuela Ramos for providing women with this opportunity to access a small loan.

loans.use: To buy construction material (5 bags of cement, 1 meter of gravel and 4 iron rods)

loans.name: Juana Isabel

texts.es:
Doña Juana Isabel, venD. medicina natural, tiene 40 años D. edad, resiD. en San Miguel, departamento D. San Miguel, vive junto a su esposo y su hijo D. 16 años D. edad.
Este negocio se fundó por iniciativa propia junto a su esposo, el horario D. atención es todos los días D. la semana D. 7:00am a 4:00pm, ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. medicina para la venta, esta inversión ayudara a incrementar el inventario y a disponer D. medicamentos para cuando le soliciten los clientes.
Aspira mantener el negocio estable, brindar una buena atención a los clientes y a traer a nuevos con la intención D. ampliarse a nuevas zonas y ganar mejores ingresos para el sostenimiento del hogar.
texts.en:
Juana Isabel sells natural medicines.  She is 40 years old and lives in San Miguel in the department of San Miguel.  She lives with her husband and their 16 year-old son.  

This business was started through her own initiative with the help of her husband.  She works every day of the week from 7am until 4pm.  She is requesting a loan to buy medicines to sell.  This investment will help her to increase her inventory and have medicines available when they are requested by her customers.  

She aims to maintain stability in the business by providing good customer service.  She also wants to bring in new customers and expand into new areas so that she can increase her income and better support her household.

loans.use: to buy medicines.

loans.name: Sara Maritza

texts.es:
Sara de 45 años, tiene un taller de confección y costura en su casa. Vive en una zona urbana llamada suburbio caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes informales. 

Le comenzó a gustar la costura desde que tenía 18 años cuando su papa le regalo una máquina de coser. Cuando tuvo sus hijos ella comenzó a ofrecer sus servicios como costurera, poco a poco con esfuerzo pudo tener una clientela fija y trabajar desde su casa. En la actualidad tiene un espacio en su casa donde tiene un pequeño taller de costura y unas maquinas de coser que ha podido comprar durante estos años. 

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar con el préstamo cemento, bloques, arena para readecuar su casa y ubicar en un mejor lugar su taller de confección. En el futuro quiere tener maquinas industriales para su taller.
texts.en:
Sara, 45 years old, has a tailoring and sewing shop in her house.  She lives in an urban area called Suburbio, where the majority of the people are informal merchants.

She began to enjoy sewing at 18 years old, when her father gave her a sewing machine.  When she had her children, she began to offer her services as a seamstress, and little by little, with effort, she was able to gain a stable clientele and work from her home.  Currently she has a space in her house where she has a small sewing shop and some sewing machines that she has been able to buy during these years.

In order to move forward with her business, she wants to use the loan to buy cement, blocks, and sand to renovate her home and put her sewing shop in a better location.  In the future, she wants to have industrial machines for her shop.

loans.use: Cement, blocks

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Doña Rosa Emilia, es una señora laboriosa de 64 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su hija de 30 años de edad, tiene un negocio de venta de comida, naciendo este por iniciativa propia desde hace 14 años, trabaja todos los días de 5:00am a 6:00pm, con entusiasmo prepara cada día alimentos para ofrecer a los clientes.
Hoy doña Rosa solicita un préstamo para la compra de arroz, frijol, huevos, aceite entre otros que le son necesarios en la cocina, con este préstamo solventara la necesidad de inversión que atraviesa con el negocio, de igual manera podrá disponer de alimentos para seguir generando ingresos a su hogar.
Su objetivo es seguir en el negocio, atender de buena manera a los clientes y seguir viendo la forma de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Rosa Emilia is a hard-working, 64 year-old woman who lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department.  She lives with her 30 year-old daughter and has a business selling food.  She set up her business 14 years ago on her own initiative.  She works every day from 5.00am to 6.00pm.  Every day she enthusiastically prepares food to offer her customers.

Rosa is requesting a loan to buy rice, beans, eggs and oil, as well as other items which are necessary for her cooking.  This loan will solve her need for investment in her business.  She will also be able to have food available so that she can continue making income for her household.

Rosa's goal is to continue in her business, serve her customers well and continue getting ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, eggs and oil

loans.name: Abdallah

texts.en: Abdallah is a 56-year-old married man from Bint Jbeil. He is the father of three children and works in transportation to provide a good living for his family. Abdallah is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua for the first time, for an urgent situation. He wants to buy an engine for his van, which is his only source of livelihood. Abdallah is honest and loved by his neighbors, friends and relatives. Abdallah hopes to provide the best for his family and seeks expansion in his work.

loans.use: to buy an engine for his van

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La señora Margarita es socia del banco comunal De La Amistad II, del Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos, su esposo se desempeña como chofer en una empresa de transporte.
Lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace 3 años, se dedica a la venta de comida  (almuerzos) que los reparte en  los aserraderos y por las tardes vende los asaditos y Juanes (comida típica de la zona).
Gracias a esta actividad, aporta dinero para los gastos de su hogar, porque el sueldo del esposo no alcanza para solventar todos los gastos.
Con éste préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 soles la señora Margarita comprará 50 tapers  de plástico,  una licuadora, un balde de plástico para su refresco, 50 cucharas, 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azúcar, ½ caja de aceite y demás insumos para la preparación de comida. 
La señora margarita agradece a Manuela Ramos por los préstamos y las charlas educativas que les imparten las promotoras en cada reunión.
texts.en:
Margarita is a member of the 'De La Amistad II' community bank which is located in Ucayali department.  She is 40 years old, married and has 2 children.  Her husband works as a driver in a transport company.

Margarita has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for 3 years.  She sells food (lunches) which she delivers to local sawmills and in the afternoon she sells 'asaditos' (barbecued meat) and 'Juanes' (a mixture of chicken pieces, rice, olives, eggs, onion and garlic, wrapped and cooked in a banana leaf).  Both are traditional food of the region.

Thanks to her business, Margarita provides money towards her family's household expenses because her husband's wage doesn't cover all their expenses.

With this loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles, Margarita will buy 50 plastic containers, a blender, a plastic bucket for her soft drinks, 50 spoons, 1 sack of rice, 1 sack of sugar, half a box of oil and other supplies for preparing her food.

Margarita is grateful to Manuela Ramos for their loans and the educational talks which they give at each community bank meeting.

loans.use: To buy 50 plastic containers, a blender, a plastic bucket for her soft drinks, 50 spoons, 1 sack of rice, 1 sack of sugar, half a box of oil and other supplies for preparing her food

loans.name: Otto Javier

texts.es:
Otto de 29 años, tiene una pequeña tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. Vive en una zona periurbana en el Fortín de Guayaquil caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra.  

Empezó hace 10 años cuando vivía en la provincia de Santa Elena (playas) con un negocio de ventas de mariscos pero para tener más oportunidades y más ingresos vino a vivir a Guayaquil hace 2 años atrás. En la actualidad tiene una tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. Trabaja desde las 06h00am pero primero se levanta a dejar a su hijo a la escuela. Vende arroz, aceite, pollos a un bajo costo. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar carnes, pollos, arroz para surtir más su tienda. En el futuro quiere comprar materiales de construcción para remodelar su casa.
texts.en:
Otto is 29 years old and has a small store in the front part of his home.  He lives in a suburban zone of Fortín de Guayaquil, characterized by its changing landscape.

He began selling seafood ten years ago when he lived in the Santa Elena (beaches) province, but he came to Guayaquil two years ago so that he could have more opportunities and income.  Now he has a store in the front part of his house, where he sells rice, cooking oil, and chicken at low prices.  He begins working at 6:00 AM, but first he gets up to take his son to school.

He will use the money from this loan to buy meats, chicken, and rice to stock his store.  In the future he wants to buy construction materials to remodel his hose.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es:
La Señora María C. es socia del banco comunal Poloma, vive en la parroquia del Valle, esta parroquia es de clima frió y se encuentra al suroeste de la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene como atractivos turísticos el sector conocido como el Verde cerro que fue sagrado para los Cañaris y de donde se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente mantiene sus tradiciones y cultura.

Doña María se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y al cuidado de sus hijos, como pasa en casa aprovecha su tiempo para criar animales como son pollos, cerdos y cuyes los cuales son para la venta y también para el consumo de su hogar.

La Señora María tiene 30 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 4 años de edad, su primera hija está en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión mecánico industrial y tiene un taller propio, gracias al trabajo en conjunto han logrado construir su casa propia.

El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos y en el alimento de los mismos.Su sueño es tener su casa propia para vivir con toda su familia.
texts.en:
María C. is a member of the Poloma communal bank.  She lives in Valle parish.  This is a cold climate parish in southwest Cuenca.  It has as a tourist attraction a place called El Verde which is a hill that was sacred to the Cañari people (ancient inhabitants of the territory of the modern provinces of Azuay and Cañari) from which one can see most of Cuenca.  Its residents maintain its traditions and culture.

María is a housewife and cares for her children.   Because she stays at home she has time to raise animals like chickens, pigs and guinea pigs to sell and for home consumption.

She is 30 years old, married and has two children who are 9 and 4 years of age.  Her oldest daughter goes to a local school.  Her husband is an industrial mechanic and has his own workshop.  Thanks to their work as a couple they have managed to build their own house.

The money from the loan will be used to buy pigs and animal feed for them.  Her dream is to have her own house to live in with her entire family.

loans.use: To buy pigs and animal feed.

loans.name: Leyda Luz

texts.es:
La señora Leyda es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras, del departamento de Ucayali, tiene 39 años y su esposo se desempeña como docente (profesor), lleva 2 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos.

Con su primer préstamo inició su negocio de productos naturales para poder ayudar con los gastos a su esposo y así ahorrar un poco de dinero, los productos los trae de la ciudad de lima y los compra por docena.

Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará 2 docenas de  frascos de chanca piedra, 1 docena de Potes de maca, 1 docena de Frascos de sangre de grado, 1 docena de Frascos de chanca piedra y 1 docena de frascos de vitaminas.

Leyda está agradecida con Manuela Ramos, gracias a los préstamos muchas mujeres pueden crecer en sus negocios.
texts.en:
Ms. Leyda is a member of the Las Almendras ["The Almonds"] communal bank, in the department of Ucayali.  She is 39 years old and her husband works as a teacher.  She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for two years.

She used her first loan to start her business selling natural products so that she could help her husband with expenses and save a little money.  She brings her products from the city of Lima, where she buys them by the dozen.

She will use this new loan of S/. 1,500 nuevos soles to buy two dozen bottles of chanca piedra, a dozen jars of maca, a dozen bottles of sangre de grado, a dozen bottles of chanca piedra [all natural remedies], and a dozen bottles of vitamins.

Leyda is grateful to Manuela Ramos because thanks to the organization's loans, many women are able to grow their businesses.

loans.use: To buy several dozen bottles of various natural remedies and vitamins

loans.name: Eclipse Total Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Eclipse Total y está ubicado en el Estado de México.El grupo está conformado por 10 integrantes. Yolanda es la tesorera del grupo. Ella se dedica a la engorda de cerdos desde hace un año, solicita el prestamo para comprar algunos cerdos pequeños, los cuales cuidará y engordará durante 5 meses, ya que sabe que en este lapso de tiempo los cerdos aumentaron razonablemente su valor y al venderlos le quedará una ganancia considerable la cual tiene pensado ocupar en hacer arreglos a su vivienda, ya que ella sola sostiene su hogar. Tiene 24 años de edad, estudio hasta el tercer año de la secundaria,es divorciada y tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad.
texts.en:
The 10-member Total Eclipse group is located in Mexico state. Yolanda is the group’s treasurer and for the past year has earned her living fattening pigs. She is seeking a loan to buy some more piglets which she will look after and fatten for five months, as she knows that in this period of time the piglets will increase in value allowing her to sell them for a considerable profit. With the money she earns she is planning to make some repairs to her house; she alone supports the household. 

Yolanda is 24 years old and studied up to third year of high school. She is divorced and has a 5-year old son.

loans.use: to buy more livestock

loans.name: Mona

texts.en: Mona is a 48-year-old married woman and the mother of two children. Mona works as a tailor, making dresses and curtains. Mona is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua for the first time in order to expand her business. Mona is an expert in her field and her clients usually recommend her to their friends. Mona helps her husband with their family’s income. Mona is working hard to improve and expand her business and she’s on the best track.

loans.use: to expand her business

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La señora Teresa es socia del banco comunal Las Perlas Manantay, del departamento de Ucayali, tiene 60 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad.
Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, el cual inició con un pequeño capital y lo ha ido incrementando estos 2 años y medio en que viene trabajando con Manuela Ramos, su esposo se encarga de atender en su negocio cuando ella se ausenta.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,300.00 soles comprará más productos de primera necesidad (1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azúcar, 1 bolsa de fideos, 1 caja de aceite, 1 caja de leche chica, 1 caja de leche grande, 1 doc.  Avena, 1 paquete de sal, 1 bolsa de detergente, 2 cajas de galleta, 3 paquetes de papel higiénico, ½  caja de conservas).
La señora Teresa está contenta porque tiene un negocio propio, aunque sea pequeño y agradece a Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad de concederle los créditos.
texts.en:
Señora Teresa is a member of the Las Perlas Manantay communal bank, in the Department of Ucayali. She is 60 years old, and is married with 4 grown-up children.

She dedicates her time to selling groceries. She started with a little capital and has been increasing it gradually over the two and a half years since she has been working with [the field partner] Manuela Ramos. Her husband looks after the store whenever she is not there.

With this new loan of 2,300 Soles, she will buy more staple goods (1 sack of rice, 1 sack of sugar, 1 bag of noodles, 1 crate of cooking oil, 1 crate of small cartons of milk and 1 of large cartons of milk, 1 dozen bags of oatmeal, 1 pack of salt, 1 bag of detergent, 2 crates of cookies, 3 packs of lavatory paper, ½ a crate of canned foods).

Señora Teresa is happy that she has her own business, small though it may be, and is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the opportunity to access credit.

loans.use: 1 sack of rice, 1 sack of sugar, 1 bag of noodles, 1 crate of cooking oil, 1 crate of small cartons of milk and 1 of large cartons of milk, 1 dozen bags of oatmeal, 1 pack of salt, 1 bag of detergent, 2 crates of cookies, 3 packs of lavatory paper, ½ a crate of canned foods

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
La señora Angela es socia del banco comunal  Las Almendras, del Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 65 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos, todos mayores D. edad.
Lleva 9 años trabajando con los préstamos D. Manuela Ramos, ella se dedica a la venta D. comida (desayunos y almuerzos), esta actividad la realiza en su propia casa.  
Con este préstamo D. S/. 1,500.00 soles comprará 4 mesas y 16 sillas, 4 manteles y algunos enseres más porque las que tiene ya están deterioradas y necesitan ser reemplazadas.
La señora Angela  agradece a Dios por su salud y a Manuela Ramos por darle la oportunidad D. poder seguir trabajando.  Está feliz  porque no depenD. D. nadie y porque lo que gana le alcanza para vivir con su esposo y sus hijos tranquilamente.
texts.en:
